111.content: VII eh? Okay who will shrink then?
111.title: FF VII Shrinkage

1111.content: Does the Cloud Strife gets shrunk by the most lovely Aeris Gainsborough?
1111.title: Aeris?

choices: We should go to her hous and see if there is a cure.
11111.content:
It was a nice peaceful day on Midgar.Everything was going perfect.the flowers were blooming,the birds were chirping,yeah lets get on with this story before I start to talk about how perfect the day is.

Aerith was looking around meadows and flowers for flowers to sell at her flower shop known to the town.While collecting flowers in her basket,she suddenly stumbles up a mysterious flower.The petals were of red on the outside of the petal while the inside of the petal was white.The stigma was a color of purple inside of it.Her eyes widen just at the sight of it!

"Oh my gosh this flower is beautiful! I should give this to Cloud"she though to herself as she picked it up,and walked back to Midgar.

After a couple of minutes,she walks to Cloud's house upon a hill.She knocks on the door and the door opens,and in the house revealed Cloud.

"Oh hey Aerith"Cloud greeted her with a smile"what brings you here?"Aerith stares down at the flower she picked out for Cloud with a blush.

"I just came by to give you this"Aerith replied as she held out the red/white flower she picked from the forest.She then handed to Cloud with a smile.Cloud looked down at the flower.He raised it up to his nose and took a sniff of it.

"Wow it....smells.....great....."Cloud stammered.All of a sudden,his visions to becomes blurry and he soon becomes melancholy.Aeris had a concerned look on her face.

"Cloud are you ok?"Aeris asked frightfully and with that,Cloud falls to the ground.

-30 minutes later-

"Uuuuuhhh what happened?Cloud asked to himself and he woke up from his slumber.He looked down below and saw that he was laying on a unfamiliar surface.It was pink and it looked like it had little slits of mounds in it.He then looked up and couldn't believe what he saw!He saw a gigantic Aeris!Her eyes were staring at him,the site was so unbelievable it made him jump.

"AAAHHHHH!! Wait,Aeris?What happened to me!?"He asked his giant companion as he tried to stop his heart from having a heart attack.Aeris had a concerned look on her face.

"I-I don't know! You sniffed the flower I gave you and all of sudden you passed out.The before I knew it you shrunk!"Aeris replied.

"Well we have to fix this somehow!What should we do?"Cloud responded.Aeris though for a moment and decided that....
11111.title: The Mysterious Flowe

choices: "I think you should pay a little for those comments earlier." (Playful not evil)
" I think I'm going to try some healing spells on you"
111111.content:
Aerith slammed her fist into her open palm like she made a decision, " Let's go to my place and see if we can fix you right on up!"

Spiky haired Cloud seemed less certain but he nodded once; not that it mattered because just as he started to nod Aerith already reached down and wrapped her fingers around Cloud's body, carrying him around like she just plucked a small bug from the ground. Gently Aerith placed him on her right open palm and started walking back through Sector 7 to get back to her home.

Constantly her eyes darted to Cloud, filled with worry but surprisingly they were also filled with a ironic sort of humor. It just seemed funny to Aerith that Cloud; SOLDIER 1st class, master swordsman, and heroic bad boy was literally nothing but a small bug on her palm. Fate was funny like that.

Cloud saw the irony too but he obviously found significantly less joy in it, he didn't like relying on anyone for anything. Sephiroth taught him that and now he was to trust everything about him to Aerith? It's not that he didn't trust her but he didn't like feeling weak. Cloud felt powerless, should a foe like The Turks show up Aerith was on her own, heck even a weakling grunt of a monster would prove too much for Cloud at his size. Fortune seemed to favour them though, for once no monsters seemed to be patrolling the slums and there was no sign of Shinra or The Turks either, Cloud and Aerith could rest easy.

"So what's it like?" Aerith asked, breaking the silence the two had ever since they started to walking.

Apparently indifferent Cloud looked back at Aerith, " What do you mean?"

"Being small." Aerith elaborated. " Being as big or maybe small than my pinky. I mean, I must look huge! Like a god or some kind of gigantic monster."

"Most monsters aren't that cute." Cloud smirked.

Aerith's cheeks puffed as if she was slightly mad, "Most? So you're saying there is a monster out there cuter than me?"

"I didn't think you were an ego maniac nor the jealous type." The shrunken hero replied with a deviant grin.

"Keep talking and I might make you walk yourself to my house, or just hand you to Yuffie."

"You wouldn't do that to me would you?" Cloud sounded confident but slight sweat building up showed Aerith's words had a deep effect.

Looking at her little friend the Ancient stuck her tongue out teasingly. " I guess that depends on how much of a gentleman you'll be."

Cloud turned away from Aerith, " Chivalry is dead, besides I doubt my jacket would cover a puddle for you. Not that I even have a jacket to offer."

Aerith eyed her brown boots, " True...I guess I could settle for you cleaning the dirt and water off of them when we get home."

Turning back to Aerith Cloud flashed a witty smirk, " You're nowhere near as innocent as you act. But that's why I like you."

"And you're nowhere near as tough as you act but that's why I like you." Aerith retorted.

After a moment the two laughed; just in time too as Aerith's home came into view. In complete contrast to Midgar's gloomy slum-like society Aerith's house was bright, shined by light, surrounded by hundreds of flowers she planted. It might as well have been in an entirely different world apart from Midgar.

At the front was Aerith's mother, sweeping the porch clean with a broom. She gave a small wave to Aerith but didn't show any true attention to anything other than sweeping. Aerith waved back with her free hand, grateful that her mother was too busy to notice Cloud in her palm.

Aerith opened the door and just like that Cloud felt like he was at peace; it was the kind of effect Aerith's home had on people, like it was a sanctuary. Aerith however, was more preoccupied with running up to fix Cloud so she stormed up the steps towards her room. Upon entering she shut her door softly and locked it as a precaution. Then, very gently she placed Cloud on her dresser counter as she sat herself down on the bed beside it.

"So what's your idea for fixing me?" Cloud asked.

Aerith appeared lost in thought and took a moment to look back at Cloud...
111111.title: Heading to Aerith's

choices: That you can give me a nice foot massage
That you can help me tend to the flowers in the church
1111111.content:
"Before we start anything I think you need to pay a little bit for those comments earlier." Aerith stuck her tongue out at Cloud playfully, cheeks a faint red.

Cloud showed no nervousness at all and stepped forward, "Well what did you have in mind Aerith? Remember I'm SOLDIER 1st Class, you'll have to do pretty good to get to me." After a moment Cloud added, "You need to practically be a demon, you're a marshmellow." He laughed.

Before replying Aerith playfully flicked Cloud with a calm smile on her face, causing him to land on his back. "Maybe but at your size a marshmellow can take you out." She looked down at her boot clad feet before looking up with a playful smirk, "Or I could give that job to my toes."

"Let's see....fairly athletic girl...boots...slums...yeah I don't think I would enjoy that too much." Cloud did not now, nor anytime soon want to experience Aerith's feet, at least not while shrunken anyway.

Aerith continued to smile and shrugged, "But I would, in fact you could go for a foot massage and everything and I would just love it." She laughed before continuing, "But I wouldn't make you do that, I'm too nice."

"Don't forget big headed!" Cloud added mischievously, he was replied with another flick.

"Anyway....like I said you outta pay a little for those comments...." Aerith's face was one of genuine kindness and not a hint of evil hidden remotely in it.

The spiky haired hero rose with a sigh, slightly dizzy from repeated flicks, "Well what did you have in mind dear? Or would you prefer some sort of more...powerful title like Goddess or something?"

It was clear as day that Cloud was making fun of her but Aerith didn't care, nope the flower girl didn't care one bit. "Maybe later, if you keep misbehaving. But again, time to pay." She gripped her slender fingers along the dresser Cloud was on, "Climb my arm up here so I whisper what I have in mind."

"You have no idea what you have in mind, this is to stall for time." Cloud muttered with a smirk as he hopped on and began walking.

Aerith giggled, "Shut up..." But Cloud was right, and as he climbed up Aerith thought about what to do. Her notion of a foot massage earlier was a joke...but it did seem like a nice idea now....of course Aerith still had yet to tend to the church flowers...that would definitely be a nice job for Cloud. The possibilities were nigh endless in fact.

Soon enough Cloud arrived at the base of Aerith's chin, slightly bothered that even that close he had to look up to even gaze at Aerith's lips. "Alright, what's my job Boss?"

Aerith's breath coerced him as she replied, "I decided.....
1111111.title: Careful What You Say Cloud

choices: Elena of the Turk shows up
11111112.content:
"That you can help me tend to the flowers in the church."

Those are the words that Cloud heard. Crossing his arms Cloud says "A little work never hurts." Aerith smiled and says "Well at your size it might not be as simple as you might think." Silently nodding Cloud indicates that he's ready. Without a second to waste Aerith wraps her hands around Cloud's small body and inserts it in what seems to be a bag of some sort. Aerith closes the bag and begins to move. As she moves Cloud can feel himself swinging back and forth while inside the bag. "How long is this supposed to last?" thinks Cloud to himself as he's taken around what he imagines is the slums of Midgar. After a few minutes the bag opens up and Cloud sees Aerith's all too familiar hand looking for him. Quickly it finds and grasps him. Once out Cloud is able to see the yellow flowers that were there when he first met the flower girl.

Aerith steps forward and once close enough to the group of flowers she places Cloud's small form on the ground. In addition to that she also hands him what appears to be a small knife of some sort. As the item is placed into his hands Cloud asks "What's this?" Aerith says with a smile "Your job is to take care of the weeds growing in the group of flowers. Simple hm?" Swinging the small knife like a blade and getting a good feeling Cloud says "Sounds good to me. But what will you be doing?" Aeirth punches a fist into her open palm and says with confidence "As you do your job, I'll be watering the plants." Wouldn't that make all the dirt into mud?

"Wouldn't that make my job harder?" asks a negative Cloud. Aerith not losing any of her spirit says "It won't be hard if you finish quickly. Plus there aren't many weeds in here. That said, let's get to work!"

Looking ahead and then back Cloud sees Aerith preparing the watering can and all her tools. Realizing it would be for the best to get ahead of her before she makes the dirt muddy Cloud rushes into the "forest" of flowers. Not long after entering the patch of flowers Cloud encounters the first weed. A rather brownish plant that seems like a pine tree of some sort. Not wasting time the miniature blonde approaches it and gets into a fighting position. He quickly attacks the plant and manages to make a good cut, but not enough to get rid of it. Thinking for a moment Cloud says "If I just cut it, it would just grow back. I need to pull it out completely." Getting an idea Cloud begins to concentrate and stares with determination at the undesirable plant. He rushes towards it and stabs his weapon into it at the base. Moving his arms upward Cloud is able to perform his famous Climhazzard Limit Break to pull the weed all the way down to its roots. While in the air he's able to get a temporary view of the rest of the area. He spots two more weeds for him to take care of.

Once he lands, Cloud hears a most pleasant sound. The sound of humming and soon that sound is accompanied by moisture as water begins to fall on the area where Cloud is. Seeing his earlier jump Aerith comes down and says as she grabs the already pulled weed "I'll take care of this. Not bad so far little guy." Aerith then continues her work on watering the plants. Feeling like the ground is a little slippery Cloud says "If I don't hurry, it will be harder to do all this. Setting out in the direction of the second weed, Cloud is able to get rid of it as well.

When he finally reaches the third weed he can hear loud footsteps approaching. No doubt it's Aerith who is coming to water the plants in the area near the weed. If she succeeds it may as well be impossible for Cloud to finish his task. Digging his tool into the base of the final weed Cloud begins with great effort to try and dispatch the final undesirable plant. The footsteps are getting louder and Cloud is beginning to worry slightly. He's admittedly a bit tired since he's no longer "fresh as a daisy" after pulling two massive weeds out. But he will not give up. Suddenly the footsteps stop and he can see a wall of pink and red, no doubt it's Aerith's dress. She's arrived. Concentrating like he's never done so before Cloud forces the knife upwards and manages to throw the weed into the air as well as himself. A sigh of relief came out of Cloud's mouth as he saw the end of his task.

Suddenly he felt himself land on something soft, but it was not the ground...it was Aerith's hand! Looking up he saw Aerith's smiling face who says "Good job. Just in the nick of time I'd say." Her other hand has the final weed that Cloud just pulled out. Aerith quickly dispatches it and waters the plants in the area. Continuing to smile Aeirth says to Cloud who looks a bit dirty after his job "I may not be able to pay you, but I'd say a bath should clear up all the dirt, wouldn't you say?" Cloud nods and says "You're also sweaty. Just because you're not visibly dirty like me, doesn't mean that you don't need a bath." Giggling a bit Aerith says "Guess we're even."

So what will happen now?
11111112.title: Church Labor

choices: "That Yuffie girl, she seems like an ideal candidate."
"Me of course, I have always wanted a pet."
111111121.content:
Still smiling Aerith bent over and looked at the garden growing in the ground. "Isn't it wonderful Cloud? These flowers, even in a city like this, grow beautifully, in the midst of a slum no less."

Cloud's eyes were distant when he eyed them, "Yeah...it's proof that no matter what anything is possible. That no matter what happens being stubborn enough will allow you to persevere...." Cloud playfully eyed Aerith, "Maybe they learned from you."

Aerith made a face at him, "Oh behave. Or I might just drop you."

"The flowers cushioned my fall before didn't they?"

Aerith giggled, "They had something to cushion then, like this I doubt you'd get such a soft landing. In fact, you would probably go right between any flowers that could save you. But you did a good job taking care of the flowers, I won't do anything to you."

"You make it sound like the possibility of you doing something like that is pretty high." Cloud laughed.

Aerith's eyebrows raised in amusement, "If you keep yapping that mouth the odds just keep going up."

"You couldn't harm a fly."

"Oh come on Cloud, I've helped you fight monsters remember?" Aerith was no sitting on the edge of the garden, Cloud in hand.

"And you always played healer!" Cloud grinned.

"Aww how cute." A mocking voice called from the back. Aerith looked over her shoulder and in the opening Cloud saw who it was too, and they both paled. Elena, Elena of the Turks was at the door of the Church, no doubt ready for some form of resistance.

Aerith rose back up and eyed Elena threatingly, albeit failing, Cloud did a much better job. "What do you want?"

Elena smirked, "No hello? Not even going to get angry at me for ruining your little moment?" Every word she said was clearly mocking the two.

Cloud took a few steps forward in Aerith's hand and pointed the small knife at Elena, "Not at all, but you ignored my question. What do you want?"

The intruder's gloved hands went up in a peaceful gesture, "Relax shorty, unless you think you can take me with that butter knife of yours." Cloud gritted his teeth and calmed, Elena was right of course; at his size there was no way he could take on a Turk. "By the way...I see you've gotten...smaller. Was it flowers by any chance?"

Shock appeared on both Aerith and Cloud's face, Aerith saying "How did you know?"

Elena shrugged, "Hojo's experiment, he was apparently doing something with Mako and the genetics of plants....I think Jenova cells were involved too. He said it was pure research but if you ask me the nut was trying to make plant monsters. Anyway that's not important right now, I'm here on orders."

Instantly Cloud felt a renewed hatred for Hojo stirring, but he didn't act on it; before he returned to Midgar with the gang Vincent told him all sorts of stories, and his experiences in SOLDIER didn't help his impression either. But Cloud put aside his vendetta and continued staring down Elena, "And those orders are?"

The Turk spoke with the clear sound of quoting someone, "Find the Ancient and bring her to me, any resistance can be dealt with as you see fit." She smirked, "Tseng's orders, now girl...come with me or I take you by force."

"Like hell you will!!" Cloud roared, pointing his blade at Elena with renewed vigor, she just saw his bravado and laughed. "Get real! You aren't even a match for my work boots, let alone worth me even drawing a weapon. And girly there isn't one that good at fighting on her own. So there isn't really any choice in the matter is there?"

Both Cloud and Aerith gritted their teeth, but Aerith spoke up first. "If I go willingly would you leave Cloud alone and just bring him to someone like Tifa or maybe Vincent? Someone who can take good care of him?" Cloud looked dismayed and prepared to respond, but Aerith quickly jammed her thumb into his mouth to silence any protests. Her eyes looked at him with sadness, and a hope he would cooperate.

Once more Elena chuckled, "I hold all the chips and you're bargaining? I like the guts girl...alright. I'll honor you're request, on my word as a Turk I swear to do what you ask."

"Thank you...." Aerith softly muttered as she rose to her feet, and walked to Elena. She kept Cloud's mouth covered, and it would remain covered as long as possible until she absolutely had to let go. If she heard his protests Aerith might lose her will. Elena opened the door of the church for them and led the way through the slums, towards a helicopter. The group boarded and instantly the machine took off.

No one spoke while on the chopper, Aerith just looked sad, Elena stared intently at her, and Cloud was still unable to speak despite his attempts at prying Aerith's finger from his jaw. It took about twenty minutes before the helicopter landed and whirred to a halt. Once again Elena led the way by jumping from the chopper. They didn't even take five steps within the building before a Shinra guard came, "Sir! I am here to escort the Ancient to Mr. Tseng Sir!"

Elena groaned but she gestured for Aerith to go with the soldier, as she passed by Aerith slid Cloud into Elena's gloved hand. In that one second Cloud was gonna scream protesting but Elena somehow knew that she was to shut him up now too, which she did. Cloud was forced to watch sadly as Aerith nodded solemnly at him and turned to walk away.

"Hey." Elena began, "Does Tseng have anymore orders for me?"

The guard replied quickly, "No, but he did have a message. Ahem..."If you succeed in getting Aerith feel free to take the next few days off, having to get past her friends has more than earned you a break."

Elena chuckled, "He's forcing me to take a break? How funny." With nothing left to do the guard turned and led Aerith away, she gave one last concerned look at Cloud as she walked.

Once Aerith was out of sight Elena removed her gloved finger from Cloud, "Okay now then, I swore I'd keep my word so I'm gonna do it." Elena turned the opposite direction Aerith went and proceeded down the hallway.

It was a moment before Cloud responded, his voice was distant and sad. "Will Aerith be okay?"

"Tseng will make sure of it."

Cloud seemed slightly reassured, "Okay then, where are you going to take me then? Because there's a few of my friends I don't think would really be good for this."

"Is that so?"

Cloud nodded, "Yeah. Barret would likely let Marlene play with me, and I have no wish to be a little girl's plaything. Cid would probably make me do something involving machines. And most of all keep me away from Yuffie. I don't have a single doubt she would turn me into a toy for her on the spot. In a lot of ways she's the worst person to take me to."

"I see...." Elena sounded like she was thinking but she quickly changed the subject, "Why didn't you fight?" Cloud appeared surprised by the question. "What?"

Elena peered at him, "I know your skills. If you really wanted to do it you could've freed yourself from me or the girl ages ago. So why didn't you?"

"I....didn't have any real options after that. It's like you said I wouldn't be able to best you like this. It's why I'm going to look for a cure as soon as possible. I hate feeling weak like this."

Elena laughed, "You're sharing state secrets with the enemy you know."

"I don't care...."

A chill seemed to form in the air. Man take away his girl and he gets real emo! Maybe I should do something.... "Relax, you'll be in the hands of someone who will take real good care of you."

"Who?"

Elena eyed him with the eyes of a hawk, with a smile as demented as it was evil.
111111121.title: Captured

choices: "Why don't you put some suntan oil on me?"
1111111212.content:
"Me of course, I have always wanted a pet."

Preparing himself to protest Elena's hold quickly tightens around Cloud. The next thing Cloud sees is is Elena's gloved finger in a special position. Realizing she aims to flick him in the head Cloud tries to get out of her grasp, but is unable to as he feels a massive force hit him in the head. Instantly he feels his eyelids becoming notably difficult to keep open and without fail the tiny blond has been rendered unconscious.

Beginning to come to, Cloud slowly opens his eyes and feels a great warmth all around him. The first thing he spots is the hot bright sun. Not wanting to end up blind, Cloud looks away as he sits up. Right in front of him he sees a massive beach with plenty of people. He can't help but take notice of the hot sand as he's sitting on it. His clothes being dark enhance the already infernal heat of the vacation spot setting as he can feel his whole body beginning to sweat.

"Awake already?"

Cloud looks to his side and sees the form of a large Elena sitting on a beach bed. Next to her is a small wooden table with a refreshing lemonade beverage. Elena is wearing a two piece bikini and dark sun glasses. Grabbing her drink Elena says after taking a sip "How do you like the environment?" Cloud more concerned for Aerith's sake says "Like I care for this place." Putting her drink on the table, Elena lowers her glasses a bit and says "Don't think you can do what you like." Putting her sunglasses back on, Elena continues to focus on the sun to allow herself the opportunity to get a good tan. Seeing how inattentive she's being Cloud decides to try and escape her to try and reach Aerith.

"I wouldn't do that if I was you."

Cloud stops in his tracks and looks in Elena's direction who continues to say "If someone else finds you, you might become lost forever. Besides I'm your closest tie to getting back with that flower girl." At hearing those words, Cloud sighs in frustration and begins to head back towards his captor. "That's right, you should be a good pet and come back to your owner."

Once he returns, Cloud asks "What do you want?" Elena ponders for a moment and says...
1111111212.title: To Costa del Sol

choices: You can just rest in my ear. Although you do have to praise me inside there
Since you had "fun" with my whole body, I get to have my "fun" with yours
11111112121.content:
After thinking for a moment Elena leaned back on the beach bed, stretching her well toned legs towards the ocean. "Why don't you put some suntan oil on me? I'm just starting to get comfy and plus you can probably do a better job than most people."

Cloud eyed the bottle of suntan oil beside Elena and shook his head, "What do I look like your maid? Do it your damn self." Cloud may have been...well puny but he still had pride, and rubbing suntan lotion over a Turk of all people was not high on his list. He just turned around, "I think if this is the kind of thing you'll be asking me to do I'll just take my chances with the strangers. Later." He started to walk away but stopped when the disturbing sound of Elena's laughter reached his ears.

She still hadn't even turned her head to him but Elena spoke with a firm mocking tone, " You really are kind of dense aren't you? First off, even if you tried to leave I could just pin you with my foot. I mean, what could you do fight it? And you have to remember just how far you are from Midgar too, it isn't cheap getting there and I doubt some stranger would just lend you the money out of the kindness of their heart." She paused for a moment, respeaking with a rather menacing tone. "And of course...this all means you are at my mercy. I'm your only connection to the Ancient Girl and unless I'm pleased with how you treat me you can just kiss even seeing her again goodbye. Now...will you still leave?"

Cloud bit his tongue, slowly turning around and returning. "Good pet." Elena commented with a smile. Cloud ignored it and walked to the suntan oil bottle, it dwarfing him by at least ten times his size. Cloud had to be no bigger than one of Elena's toes and she expected him to do this task? The humiliation alone was impossible to bear, but with Aerith in his mind Cloud did it. He sighed, "How...should I do this?"

Elena clicked her tongue and pointed a finger at the edge of her beach bed, looking there Cloud saw, just by him, a sort of hill made from the sand of Costa Del Sol; reaching just high enough that someone Cloud's size could walk up to the beach bed safely and arrive at Elena's feet. All Cloud had to do was get the suntan oil on his hands, walk up the hill, and apply where needed...but how would Cloud get the oil? Elena seemed to read his mind and acted accordingly, with a flick of her pointer finger the bottle fell to it's side. "Get started before I throw you into the ocean." She muttered impatiently.

Muttering something under his breath Cloud dragged his feet to the bottle. Lucky for him it seemed Elena opened the bottle prior to him awakening and with it on its side the hole made a perfect opening for Cloud to get in. Of course some oil got on the beach but the hero had a sneaking suspicion if he used that oil Elena would punish him for it, so he crawled into the bottle to be safe. Inside it was...a new experience to say the least; the smell of all that suntan oil at Cloud's size was absolutely unreal, it was scented with what seemed to be a strawberry scent and the odor was strong enough to even make Cloud a tad light headed. But with Aerith still in his mind he managed to focus on his task, and as much as he despised it he rolled around in the oily liquid until his entire body was covering in a thick layer of it. He exited the bottle with the brown goo covering his entire body and proceeded up the sand hill, once there he was face first with Elena's soles.

Cloud sighed as he began; he threw himself against Elena's sole and rubbed his entire body against it in an attempt to get the oil as well spread as possible. It worked oddly enough, but....it made Cloud look like he was humping or caressing Elena's foot...something he did NOT want to do no matter the situation. But he took it like a proud SOLDIER and went back down to repeat the process. Memories of Aerith were all that Cloud focused on as he carried out his task; his body was working, his mind was reminiscing. Because of this time seemed to fly, and Cloud barely gave notice to anything. Before he knew it he was at Elena's calves, rubbing himself against the well toned muscle which oddly had no hairs at all even at Cloud's size. Next were thighs...the hips...the enormous butt....flat stomach...breasts....and finally Elena's admittedly beautiful face. During all this Elena said nothing, and did nothing aside from turn over for Cloud to get the other side; but she was practically enimating the aura of absolutely adoring the power over Cloud. And finally, when Cloud finished rubbing his body and spreading the oil along Elena's forehead the girl's fingers lifted him into her palm.

He was absolutely exhausted no question about it. Having to make all the trips and apply the suntan oil.....it was probably the most physically grueling task Cloud had ever done, and that wasn't even bringing in the humiliation and emotional aspects of it. But ever being a tough guy Cloud didn't show any signs of being scared, he didn't want to give Elena any leverage at all.

She still didn't raise her head to address the young man but regardless Elena spoke, "You did a very very thorough job SOLDIER-boy. You even got my breasts and butt...you're lucky I didn't just smack you for being a pervert; especially for the way you were spreading the oil...were you getting freaky with my whole body?" She giggled.

Cloud averted his gaze, "Shut up, your body holds no attraction for me." But his face was bright red.

"Your face tells a different story my pet. But anyway you did an alright job, but next time work on spreading it evenly...about half of it is uneven."

Cloud eyed her with a bored expression, "And you're rather calm about it...knowing you I would've figured you'd just tossed me into a work boot or something and forget I existed."

Elena made an obviously face dramatic expression, "Why I would never....yet. But that is a good idea. You did what I asked, no complaints after that little outburst. I know you have to be tired after that little ordeal, so I'll be a little kind for now."

Still appearing apathetic Cloud eyed the still very bright morning sky, "What're we going to do now? Leave for the hotel you're staying at?"

Elena chuckled, "Nope, I need to work on my tan. And as for you.....
11111112121.title: The Application Process

11111112122.content:
Pondering for minutes Elena looks up at the sky with her sunglasses and calmly says "Sit tight like a good pet. There will be plenty of time for you to please me." Sitting down on the hot sand Cloud can't help but feel frustration. Biting his lower lip at the thought of Aerith in Shinra's hands only enhances his anger. But he can't honestly do much as Elena's made it quite clear. "If only there was a way..." says Cloud sounding rather bleak as the hot sun bears down on him.

Elsewhere in Costa del Sol near the inn two children have managed to appear. The boy has black hair wearing blue shorts and a white shirt. While the girl has brown hair, a white hat, a white shirt with a one piece red bathing suit. In addition to that the girl has a refreshingly cool sweet chocolate ice cream cone on her right hand to help fight off the heat. Giving it a lick the girl asks "So what was it that you found on the boat?" The boy opens his palm and says sounding rather excited "This!" In front of the girl is a yellow sphere and she asks "Is it a jaw breaker?" The boy defensively says "No you idiot! It's materia!" As she did so Scarlet continued to talk, “I’m not sure how you ended up so small but I think you’ll come to enjoy serving me little SOLDIER. Maybe things will work out better than you could have imagined.” The other stocking was now off too, leaving Scarlet’s soles bare as they towered over Cloud. “I’m not sure exactly what I’ll do with you so you might want to do a good job. Let’s just say you have a lot riding on this.” The malicious woman let out a sinister laugh as she awaited Cloud’s hands along her feet.

The entire time Cloud barely listened, She talks a lot. He boredly looked up to the foot well over his height. It was menacing sure, after all a single step could very well end his life. But at the same time the spiky-haired man just eluded a Turk, a notorious fighter. This woman was someone who was all brain, no brawn. It would make tricking her harder, but if all else fails he had a decent chance at a fight if he could get a blade. Cloud planted a hand of Scarlet’s left heel. Unlike Elena’s foot this one had very little muscle beneath the skin. It was soft and stressed, the feet of a wealthy woman who wore nothing but heels. It was considerably easier to began to mead the folds of skin and massage than with Elena.

Cloud grimaced as his hands grazed over a thin layer of liquid he knew to be sweat. At least with his last captor the water came from the ocean, this was just disgusting. Not that he showed it, but Scarlet seemed to smile as if she felt his negativity all the same. However, Cloud’s casual massaging was not satisfying her. “I hope you can do better than this. You were in SOLDIER; I know you have it in you to go much, much faster. Keep this up and I can’t guarantee my kindness will last.”

The snobbish attitude directed at him made Cloud want to hit Scarlet in the face, but he couldn’t risk upsetting her. Not when he was so close to rescuing Aerith. “Sorry Mistress.” In an apology the young man leaned forward and gently planted a kiss along Scarlet’s tender soles before increasing his pace exponentially. Looming above Scarlet laughed, “I rather liked that, keep doing it.” Another mental sigh came as Cloud started to combine kissing Scarlet’s foot with his massaging. It was degrading and Cloud would never live this down, but in comparison to how things went with Elena he’d manage. The only difficult part was knowing how close he was to his friend, but still so far away.

It was only a few minutes later Scarlet once again grew unsatisfied with how Cloud was doing. When she spoke it took large amounts of self-control to just not shout for her to shut up. “You’re doing alright I suppose…but I feel something is missing. I think it’s because your hands are so small, use your whole body.”

Cloud couldn’t tell if Scarlet was trying to humiliate him or if she was honestly this spoiled about a foot massage. Either way he kept up his façade of the meager little slave and began to rub his entire body along Scarlet’s foot. The result was in instant moan from the woman who urged Cloud with her hand to keep on going. “I think this is just the job for you little one! You can be my permanent foot slave.”

Not if I can help it. He thought bitterly. It was truly impressive Cloud was still fighting back every quick remark and stayed silent the whole time.

Silence was not always best though. Scarlet was no fool. All her poking and prodding didn’t so much as draw a reaction other than submission. SOLDIERs were better than that. That could only mean Cloud had an ulterior motive, and it didn’t take a genius to piece together what it was. Watching Cloud climb up her foot to continue his massage of her toes Scarlet began to smirk as she approached the torture from a different angle, “I realize your loss may be hurting you but I hope you’ll come to think of life as my slave as much better than what you’re leaving.”

Cloud couldn’t help but react, “My loss?”

“Oh yes, losing that Ancient girl. I honestly feel bad for you. Shrunken and then you lost your lover? Such a life is cruel, but that’s why I’m here. To make your life better.” Scarlet peered from between her soles, smiling an evil smile.

Cloud climbed down from Scarlet’s toes he just finished massaging and approached her second foot. “…She’s not my lover.”

“Oh! I do apologize. Though I guess that’s a good thing…”

The shrunken man’s reaction was a tight clench of the foot he was massaging. The woman smiled further. “Why is it a good thing…?” Cloud was almost hesitant to ask.

“Because she keeps trying to resist us the President gave Hojo permission for some…experiments.”

“Experiments?” There was no hiding Cloud’s alarm.

Alternatively, Scarlet was getting increasingly malicious with each word. “Oh yes, his latest obsession has been materia. So he’s attempting to use materia to try and change the girl’s memories. If it works she’ll be more than willing to see things for how they really are. Shinra Corporation as the good guys, and you AVALANCHE members as nothing more than worthless bugs. In some cases more literally than others.” Scarlet laughed.

Cloud stopped his massaging, unable to react. Was Scarlet bluffing? What if she wasn’t? It definitely sounded reasonable. If that was so he had limited time, he had to rescue Aerith! But how? “Ahem.” The giantess cleared her throat to remind Cloud of his duty. She realized he was hurting and desperate for time, that’s precisely why she was starting to get a rush from making him wait with menial tasks. But a massage could only go on for so long, and ten minutes later it was done.

Scarlet wiggled her toes with a soft smile; her feet felt better than they had in years. “Not bad at all, a bit rough but I think we can work that out over time. Welcome to your new life as my toy.”

"Tifa,I.....
111112.title: I Will Posses Your Heart

choices: Tifa agrees to stay home and have cloud spoil her

1111122.content:
Tifa’s eyes lit up with joy when she heard Cloud say that she was the one he wanted to be with. She smiled brightly and fought the urge to crush Cloud to her chest, knowing that doing that might hurt the shrunken man. Unable to control her excitement, she started kissing Cloud, seeing no harm in giving the man that had returned her affections a few small pecks. Cloud raised his hands feebly as he was brought to Tifa’s plump lips and pushed hard against them. He sank into the spongy flesh as Tifa softly kissed him, which felt more like she was trying to suck off his face. His head was pulled into the gap between her lips and he struggled to pull himself out. Pushing against her lips, his head popped out and he gasped for air. All of this went unnoticed by Tifa as she continued to kiss the small man.

Finally pulled away from her lips, Tifa smiled down at her new boyfriend and carefully placed him on a table. Cloud lay there dazed, only vaguely listening as Tifa slowly backed away and started speaking. “Let me just change into something. I’ll be right back.” No waiting for him to answer, Tifa left with a skip in her walk. Cloud watched her go and then fell back once he was left alone.

“What have I gotten myself into?” He asked himself, knowing the answer was obvious; he had gotten himself involved with his sexy giant old friend. He and Tifa had a long past together and his reason for agreeing that he wanted to be with her was based not on love and friendship, but survival and lust. He was alone with Tifa, a very temperamental girl, if he turned down her affection he knew he would suffer. If he was lucky she’d just stomp him and things would be over, but if she decided he needed to be punished, Cloud knew she’d make his tiny body suffer. Tifa was a very nice girl, normally, but Cloud knew that if he pissed her off he would be doomed. So, he had told her what she wanted to hear because he wanted to stay alive.

But it wasn’t just survival that made him return Tifa’s affections, it was also a growing desire for her. He had been with Aeris for a while now and all they had done was hold hands and share small kisses. Cloud knew he was supposed to be a hero and a man of virtue, but he had his needs and Aeris didn’t satisfy them. Tifa was smoking hot, with those big breasts of hers and that tiny skirt that showed off her well-sculpted legs. Cloud knew he could go all the way with her easy. That would have to wait though, if they tried to consummate the relationship, Cloud would end up a smear on Tifa’s body. Once he got fixed, then they would get it on.

Sure, he was hardly being noble or living up to the expectations a lot of his friends had for him, but wanting to stay in the good graces of a girl that could kill you at a whim and had a killer body was just smart. Why do the heroes always have to do the right thing for everything they did? He’d still fight for good, stop villains and protect the weak, but he also wanted to be safe and get some action. He was only being human.

“I’m back,” Tifa deeply called out as she stepped back into the room. Cloud sat up and stared openly at Tifa, a smile on his face at the sight of what she was wearing. “What do you think?”

“You look marvelous,” Cloud told her as his tiny eyes looked at the giant landscape in front of him. Tifa was wearing her old outfit from when they had been traveling around and fighting bad guys. She was wearing the sleeveless white shirt that tightly clung to her big bouncy chest and bared her stomach. Also, she had on the short black miniskirt and pair of black suspenders that she wore back then. She even had on the big brown boats with black socks. She looked gorgeous and Cloud couldn’t wait to hold her in his arms when he was back to normal. However, Tifa wasn’t going to wait that along.

“You should see me without my clothes on,” Tifa said as she reached down to scoop Cloud up. His tiny body fit nicely in her palm and Tiffa had to giggle as he fell onto his back as she lifted him up to her face. He was so perfect at this size. He looked so adorable at his current height, like a pet you have to cuddle. He was manageable too. Tifa would never have to worry about where he was because she could carry him in her pocket or in other places. She was sure Cloud wouldn’t mind being out in her bra or even in her shoe. It would be nice feeling her new boyfriend huddling around her toes as she went for a walk.

“Shouldn’t we talk about fixing something important first?” Cloud nervously said as Tifa hungrily looked at him. She had that look she got when they were kids and she had something bad planned for him. She never saw it as bad as long as she had fun, but Cloud would disagree. Tifa could be a very caring person, but when she wanted to do something, nothing could talk her out of it. Cloud was hoping she’d feel like she had to protect and care for him, but instead all she wanted to do was play with her new tiny boyfriend.

“You’re right, there is something important that we have to fix,” Tifa quickly said, realizing what she had forgotten to take care of. Cloud sighed, knowing his new giant caretaker would help him fix his current predicament. That hope was dashed when she started walking towards the door. “We need to fix things between you and Aeris. We need to tell her we are together now and you two are done forever.”

“Are you sure you want to do this now? I mean, we just got together, shouldn’t we wait until, I don’t know, I’m normal size?” Cloud suggested, fearing what was going to happen next. He didn’t want to break Aeris’s heart, especially when all she needed to do to kill him was grab him from Tifa and throw him to the ground. He wanted to avoid angering any girl that might want to hurt him and Tifa’s announcement would anger the flower girl to the point where she might break him for breaking her heart.

“Nope. No better time then the present,” Tifa said without looking at Cloud. She wanted to end that part of Cloud’s life so they could start their own. Besides, if she waited until Cloud was normal size before talking to Aeris, she might never tell her. Tifa had no real desire to see Cloud back to normal. He might have been her knight in shining armor, but she preferred him as her pet boyfriend more. She wasn’t going to help him return to normal, not until the novelty of having him this size wore out.

“But..but…but…” Cloud sputtered, wracking his brain for a reason not to go that might not tip Tifa off that his reason for being with her was not solely based on love. He needed a reason to keep her away from Aeris and only one idea came to mind. “We shouldn’t leave your home, not without first celebrating our new relationship. Let me treat you like the princess you are. We’ll do anything you want. I’ll do anything you want. Lets just be alone together.”
1111122.title: Not Being Stupid

11111221.content:
After what seemed like an eternity Tifa nodded with a smile. " I have always wanted to be waded on hand and foot, and at your size I think you can hit all the right pleasure spots." The brunnettes massive cheeks turned a faint red as her lips twirled into a loving and yet at the same time empowering smile. Her free hand found its way to her hip where it situated itself along the apex of the curve.

This entire pose combined with Tifa's sentence led Cloud to a very simple if not perverted idea. Immediately his cheeks flared as red as the darker portions of Aeris' dress. "You aren't gonna....no way! I know we're together but that is going way too fast!"

Tifa's smile quickly turned into a confused frown, "What are you talking about? I was talking about maybe a massage, like at my feet and shoulders. Even now I still have knots and bruises from back in our adventuring days." Embarassed the spiky haired swordsman averted his gaze, his voice box locked in discomfort. Cheeks redder than ever.

The giantess was confused, not even ten seconds and already her boyfriend was acting odd. What was he....it all clicked in that moment. The frown of confusion turned back into a smile filled with lust. "I get it....you thought I was gonna put you...in "there" " With her hand on the hip Tifa outstretched her index finger and gently tapped along the edges of her crotch; the thin fabric of her miniskirt literally hiding next to nothing. As if entranced Cloud watched, aroused in a way he had never felt with Aeris.

Fully aware of Cloud's eyes on her Tifa giggled like a little girl again. " You gotta learn to control those urges my little Cloud. You'll get to the finish line eventually but you have to compete in the race first."

Cloud shrugged, slowly regaining his cool demeanor. " In that case I'll cheat." he smirked up at his giantess of a girlfriend.

Tifa shook her head, " Afraid not, cheat and you'll suffer some penalties."

In retrospect Cloud probably shouldn't have asked but before he knew it the question escaped his lips. " What penalties? "

Giggling again Tifa's cheeks turned slightly red once more. " Well you may get a chance to experience what you want but it may not be the way you envision it." Cloud didn't even want to imagine what Tifa was hinting at with that statement. " Maybe a nice punishment in my boots, possibly even as I wear them. I could probably make you do some excersises with me too." Again Cloud didn't want to imagine what Tifa meant or had in mind with that series of statements.

"And lastly...." Tifa continued, now enjoying her little teasing taunts. " If you really be a bad boy I might let Yuffie have you for a couple days....or weeks." No matter how hard he resisted Cloud instantly pictured any and all possible results of that. Take Tifa's anger, moodiness, and pretty much every negative trait and stick them in a teenage girl and you got Yuffie. Granted she had her own happy go lucky personality but that definitely didn't make her an appealing owner. God knows the horrors she would make Cloud go through.

"I think I'll play fair.."

Tifa laughed, "Somehow I knew you'd say that. Anyway we got sidetracked, we need to decide what you can do to please this princess. I'm thinking massages, you can do my feet,shoulders and back...and if you do really good maybe it could turn into a full body. " She paused for a moment to think, "Hmm....it sounds more like slave work but you could probably do some good cleaning and such. Like between my toes, maybe my ears, possibly beneath my nails. But like I said that stuff sounds more like slavery than a relationship, it'd be no different from asking you to lick my foot or eat my ear wax."

The miniature SOLDIER seemed to turn green, "Please don't be so clear with the examples...."

Seemingly ignoring Cloud Tifa playfully poked her boyfriend, knocking him flat onto her palm. "What do you think we should do baby?"

Cloud didn't even have to think, the choice was between slavery and what would likely turn into a very kinky massage. "Massage of course!"

Tifa smiled.........

11231.content:
It was a normal day at Balamb Garden for many: students were coming and going and businesses were strong. Even if the Sorceress' menace was over, SeeDs jobs was not done, as the need for hired mercenaries was still felt, given all the monsters that roamed the wilderness.
However, nothing major was happening, or at least not major enough for the Garden to deploy some of its best soldiers, and many of them decided to use this time to just relax and take some time off while still being ready if needed.

Zell Dincht was not one of them, and many would say he was unable to simply stay still. Since there were no missions for him, he spent days at the Training Center to keep his training going and he enjoyed it enough even if all he did was punching and kicking Grats, because every once in a while a T-Rexaurus could decide to show its ugly mug.
For Zell that was not a normal day however, for more reasons than one, but the first one was that the Garden recently requested and received a supply of brand new monsters directly from the technological paradise of Esthar. Finally he could kick the butt something different than Grats for a change!
And he was in pretty good spirits when finally one of these monsters showed up after Zell defeated its third Grat: it was another plant type, but noticeably bigger and tougher-looking, with a giant mouth taking the place of its face.

"Oh yeah! Finally a change of pace!" Zell said excitedly, ready in his fighting stance and sizing the enemy: it looked a lot like an Ochu, but it was purple instead of green.
Zell didn't waste any time after cracking his knuckles and immediately charged at the monster. It didn't move, but as the blond kid was getting nearer, it raised one of its tentacled arms to slam him. Zell noticed it just in time and leapt sideways. He then kept his charge but didn't punch the monster: he lowered himself and hit Ochu's legs with a slide kick, making it lose its balance and leaving it flailing helplessly with its giant mouth facing upwards.
Zell turned around and noticed a big red gland on the back of one of the monsters' arms. He grinned.
"That's a weak spot if I ever saw one!"
He then jumped up and hit it with a spinning kick, destroying it immediately while the Ochu cried in pain. It wasn't all good however: as soon as Zell destoyed the gland, a purple-ish smoke surrounded him. "W-What the...?"
He said confused, looking around still in his fighting stance, but noticed that he was breathing normally, didn't feel sleepy and, once the smoke cleared, he could see the Ochu's corpse in front of him.
He was apparently perfectly fine, but was pretty disappointed by the quick match, so he decided to call it quits for the day.

Almost as soon as Zell went into his room, he started to feel strange.
"Ngh! W-What is this? Was...it...that...?" he asked himself as suddenly he felt his body growing weaker and almost struggling to keep his eyes open, but it was not the effect of some sleeping magic.
He didn't fall to the floor only because he managed to get close enough to his bed to fall belly up on it, with his legs hanging slightly over its side.

While Zell was unconscious, his body shrank out of his clothes and slid down his now huge jeans and hit the floor after rolling a short distance away. This was enough to wake him up, and he was now facing his enormous bed.
"How did I get so small?!" he asked himself in a mix of anger and confusion. He answered himself almost immediately after: "That smoke...so that's what it does!"

What happens next?
11231.title: Yes, let's shrink Zell!

After a whille he found nothing and just lowered his head, but only for a moment before he raised it again looking ahead.
"Wait, what the hell am I doing? This is not time to think, it's time to act!" He said with a confident grin, almost forgetting his current plight.

What does Zell do?

11231121.content:
"I could try to go and get help..."
Zell muttered to himself while looking around and his gaze stopped at his alarm clock, which revealed it was late afternoon.
"...or I could help myself to some hot dogs from the cafeteria!"
He said louder and louder as if he had just gotten a grat idea, and luckily no one could hear him. He nodded to himself: his mind was set! It was all perfect: he would get a few hot dogs and could just go get help later after all.
He glanced at the alarm clock one more time: it was late, but the cafeteria was not far from the dorm and Zell was confident he could make it before it closed for the day. After that he went to his room's door and crawled under it to get out, since it was closed, and then started running towards the cafeteria. At his current size, the corridor seemed huge and far longer than normal, almost endless, but Zell kept running undeterred and unhindered: as it turned out, no one was around there at that time, probably everyone was training or studying.
After a much longer time than he anticipated, Zell finally reached the end of the dorm and the connecting pathway to the Garden's main ring that, unlike the dorm, was actually pretty crowded as usual. He stopped for a moment, in his over eagerness, only now he realized that he was completely naked and didn't bother to try and find something to cover himself with. For a moment he thought about going back and remedy this, but he shook his head.
< Wait! What am I worried about? > he thought to himself, shaking his head. < If I go back, I'll never make it in time. Besides, now I'm so small, no one will notice me! >
And so he kept running towards his destination, going into the main ring that connected all the Garden's facilities. His thoughts proved to be true: no one paid attention to him, and no one actually noticed him.
However, not all was well for Zell, as that meant that, while he was running to the cafeteria, he had to also jump and dodge to avoid being stepped on. Luckily for him, he was able to do just that thanks to his athletic physique and training. He finally went out the ring onto the connecting pathway leading to the cafeteria and, after a brief stop to catch his breath, he finally made his way to the cafeteria proper. There were fewer people down this hallway, so Zell could easily avoid them, and again, no one seemed to notice he was there.
Howerver, when he finally was in sight of the cafeteria door, he could see the staff accompanying the last few students out and he knew what that meant: it was closing time! He wasted no time, and started running at top speed towards the door, to reach it before they closed it, mustering all his strength to do so.

And what happens next?

112311211.content:
Zell was always a fast runner, but in his current condition it would have taken him some time before reaching it and in the meantime he could clearly see one member of the cantina staff was just on the other side and about to close for the day. And in that moment the door never felt so far away. Nonetheless, Zell wasn't one to just give up without a fight, so he kept running through the empty corridor and confident that he wouldn't be noticed.
< I have to make it! > He thought.
< I've come too far to fail now! >
The cantina staff had just put the key in the keyhole, ready to close shop, and Zell knew this was the time: make or break it.
He then leapt forward and, luckily, managed to lunge himself beyond the door that was shut right behind him as he ducked and used both hands and feet to soften the impact of his landing. Only when he stopped he looked upwards to the staff with a cocky grin that looked like it said
"Gotcha!"
After standing up and trying to keep his balance against the earthquake he felt as the staff walked away, he took a moment to look around now that he didn't need to hurry anymore.

The cantina felt like a completely different place from his perspecive, and not just because he was as big as an ant, if even that. There was a different atmosphere alltogether when it was almost entirely empty save for the cooks and cleaning staff.

Zell took some time looking around and taking in the atmosphere to unwind from the race against time he had just before. All he needed to do now was to wait for the cooks to prepare the following day's hotdogs and leave so he could act undisturbed.
He sat down next to a chair leg to wait and for a while all was quiet: no one came close enough that he risked being squished and still no one noticed he was there.

However this would not last, as while it was true that he didn't have to hurry anymore, it was also true that his troubles were far from over.
That's because...

Zell barely had the time to realize what was going on before he heard a loud *thud* and felt a tremor in the ground so sudden and violent that he lost his balance and fell on his ass.

Zidane awoke with a groan, he'd been partying pretty hard in the rougher districts of Lindblum with his Tantalus crew, he foolishly got into a drinking contest with Blank and must have passed out from exhaustion coupled with copious amounts of alcohol. His vision was blurred as he rubbed his eyes, eventually things came into focus.

Immediately he could tell something wasn't right here. With a heave, Zidane gets to his feet and looks around, the air was still, which probably meant he was indoors, but this room was massive! Glancing around for something to give him an idea of where he was, the thief suddenly gasps. He should have pieced it together, the soft spongy ground beneath his feet, the soft colours all around. He was on a bed, in a bedroom. Judging by the pastels and decoration around the colossal room, a girls bedroom at that. Doing a quick mental calculation, Zidane estimates himself to be around a half-inch tall. Miniscule by anyone's standards. Even Vivi, the diminuitive black mage would tower over him in his current state.

The master thief's musings are cut short when a mountain draped in linen and bedding, the sleeping owner of this room no doubt, begins to stir. The simple act of this titaness turning in her sleep caused Zidane's very world to shake. At least now he could see who the girl was, and figure out how best to get her attention. Gulping down any nervousness that was in his heart, Zidane approaches the massive slumbering form of....

Still smiling with a dopey expression Zidane reminisced about his journey, all of the friends he made, all his quality time with Dagger, even their for all intents and purposes "Marriage" in the Outer Continent. The memories made him feel happy with nostalgia.

Viva was happy. Everything has changed since he meets Zidane, Steiner, and the other. For the best mainly, but also for the worst when he discovered his origins. But having friends who believe in him, and the journey they spent together was a great help for him to accept the fact he was going to "stop" someday.

But even thought his friends will be always here for him, Vivi loved to be alone the most of the time. Thinking, always thinking about insignifant stuffs for normal people. Vivi loved to question everything about life and the world, now more than ever as he started to feel what people call "death" coming to him. He'll never get used to this word, but he tried to as Vivi was a personn and he accepted it.

This day was strange. Vivi had a feeling that the whole environnement became a little bigger than usual, and sometimes people looked at him strangely, thought that he didn't really pay attention to this. He came back at the hostel of Alexandria, not caring to wonder why the stairs became bigger and bigger these last times. He had to make more efforts to go upstairs....

Once he finally arrived, someone familiar was waiting for him in the middle of the room, it was...
1132.title: Vivi, he's already little

choices: let's go to see Dagger she might find something !
Mikoto is at Alexandria let's go to see her !
11321.content:
" Eiko ?" Vivi was surprised to see her at Alexandria, and...in his room !

" Yeah it's been a long time !! " She replied while walking to Vivi.

Vivi realized that Eiko was bigger than before "Eiko, you grew up ? " he reacted, which made Eiko annoyed by his own stupidity.

" You silly didn't have notice ? " she started waiting for him to find out what's happenning. Vivi was thinking, but nothing came out. "you ARE the one becoming small !! I came to Alexandria to see Zidane when i've heard people talking about a black mage smaller than before, they didn't even know for sure if it was you or a new prototype ! "

"Wh...what are you saying ? it doesn't make sense. People don't shrink...." Vivi commented not sure to know if he was right or not.

"...and you're still shrinking !! Look at you !! " Eiko affirmed, as Vivi was now seeing her becoming bigger and bigger, not knowing what was going on " He...help me !!! " he yelled with fear.

Eiko began to panick also as the Black mage was now having a size of a small Oglop and he didn't stop shrinking ! " stop..This is the way ! " She fortunately quickly found a way to help him. " Vivi use that spell 'STOP' on your magic ! "

" On my magic ? How...am i supposed to do that ?! " he asked unsure of how this gonna work.

"Just DO IT !! " She yelled. Vivi had no choice and used that spell as she recommended, and suddenly he stopped shrinking !

"Pheeeeewww " Eiko sighed, relieved that it worked.

" I'm still...moving ?"

"that's because you managed to did it on your magic and not yourself ! You really should learn to trust yourself sometimes !"

"...."

Eiko then picked him up in her hand. " At last i feel big for the first time in my life ! " she joked, thought that Vivi didn't seem to enjoy being smaller than he already was !

" I want to grow back...."

" You're not funny you know ?! You should be happy to be in the hand of a giant beautiful girl like me ! " She started. "But you're right. Your spell won't work forever, so...."
11321.title: Eiko

choices: Garnet has to remove Vivi's magic. He doesn't want her to do that
there's nothing to do. He will keep shrinking forever
113211.content:
Not wasting any second, Eiko placed the tiny Vivi on her head near her ribbon. " Sorry i don't have any pocket so hold on ok ?"

Vivi obeid and grabbed her ribbon with all his strenght, as Eiko began to run and left the hostel. Throught the streets, the wind was strong for the Black mage who felt he was going to fly away soon or later, but somehow he managed to remain in place.

It took several long minutes for him before Eiko reached the entrance of the castle, with two soldiers guarding it.

" Sorry little girl, no one is coming in today." Said one.

"FIRST ! I'm not a little girl ! Second i'm a friend of your queen ! She wants to see me ! " Eiko yelled at them.

" I'll be surprise if the queen of Alexandria was a friend of yours ! " the guard mocked. " Now leave the place or we'll call your parents!"

" LEEET ME IN !!!" Eiko screamed,

" What's happenning there ?" said a familiar voice coming to the guards. Vivi could recognize Beatrix who hasn't change a bit.

"This girl is making some noises, should we..." the guard started before being interrupted by the General of Alexandria. " I know her it's ok. Go inside and leave me alone with her."

the two guards were surprised, but they didn't waste time to obey. Beatrix then adressed to Eiko : " I suppose you came for the Queen ?"

"Yeah that's right ! i wanna see Dagger ! " Eiko nodded.

" Sure, but first..." Beatrix suddenly grabbed something from Eiko's hairs, and Vivi found himself in the hand of the most terrifying woman he ever meet in his life. "...what's that ?" she asked.

"That's...Vivi ! He needs help from Dagger ! " Eiko admitted.

" Oh...the black mage. I remember. Yeah it seems he needs help." Beatrix felt Vivi struggling in her hand and asking her clumsily to put him down. Some actions she intentionally choose to ignore and looked back at Eiko. "Follow me".

It took them some minutes to reach the entrance of Garnet's room. " Your Majesty, two of your friends came to see you". Garnet turned to Beatrix and Eiko, wearing her familar orange outfit she used to have with Zidane and the others.

" Oh Eiko it's been a long time ! it's a good to see you ! " Garnet said with joy. Eiko ran to her and hugged the queen by surprise who never got used to Eiko's personnal "manners"'

"Good to see you too ! " she replied

"...but i can't see the second friend you mentionned ? " She asked to Beatrix.

"He's in my hand " Beatrix opene her palm, revealing a tiny Vivi now surrounded by three giantess as Beatrix approached Eiko and Garnet.

"...hi Mrs Dagger...."

Garnet placed her hands on her mouth obviously shocked by the size of her friend. " Vivi...how did you get so small ?! "

"that's exactly why we came here." Eiko added. " But not only because of that, we also wanted to see you right, Vivi ? "

"Ye..yes !!"

" Maybe i should leave you alone " Beatrix said and put Vivi into the soft hand of Garnet. " Thanks Beatrix " she said before the General leaves. Garnet then focused on the tiny Black mage in her hand and couldn't help but think he was really cute, more than before, but of course this was something she couldn't tell him. This would be...kinda humiliating for him.

" Can you...fix me, Mrs Dagger ? " Vivi was determined to not remain that small.

"I'll se what i can do " Garnet sat on her bed and placed Vivi on her knees. " Eiko, i think i might need your magic to help to find out what's wrong with him."

" Sure ! " Both Eiko and Garnet joine their hand above Vivi, which made him feel uncomfortable, as they closed their eyes and a white light appeared from the giant hands. Thought that he trusted them, Vivi also closed his eyes not sure if this gonna hurt or not. After a moment, the light disappeared, Vivi and the giantesses opened their eyes, but Garnet looked worried....
113211.title: let's go to see Dagger .

choices: ...and unfortunately landed right into Garnet's shoe !
...and falls on Garnet's shoe, then running under the bed
1132111.content:
"This is worst than expected. Vivi i think you are dying, that's why you're shrinking. Your magic has an influence on your process to die somehow, so your body will keep shrinking until you disappear." Garnet announced sadly.

" I knew it...i felt it was a matter of days before i die. I'm ready ! " Vive replie to both Eiko and Garnet's surprise.

"What are you talking about ?! " Eiko started " You're not going to die like, right Dagger ?! "

" Yes. The good news is that i can save you, but you'll never grow back..and it will cost your magic. " Garnet sounded dramatic. Maybe because she knew somehow how it feels to loose magic, thought that in her case she once lost only her chimerical magic. What she was offering to him was a pain he would never be able to fulfill.

" I d'rather die. Thanks you for your help Mrs Dagger, but it's ok i...mean it " Vivi replied

" Soooo silly !! Remember how you feared to die before ? And now you ask for it ?! " Eiko yelled in anger.

" I can't run away from death forever...i did my time. I meet friends, i had a life and a meaning. If i live without my size, and without my magic, then this is not a life anyway !"

" Vivi, i know it's hard. But once i'll remove your magic, i will keep you with me so you'll be safe. " Garnet added, unsure if her words were choosen right.

" I'm not a pet you can keep ! i want my freedom, i want my size, and i want my magic ! " Vivi exclaimed with an unusual confidence.

"And i won't wait to see you die when i can save you ! " Garnet said, thought that it was heartbreaking for her to know what she was about to take from him.

" Do it Dagger ! he's too stupid to make the right choice ! " Eiko told her, as Vivi was horrified to see Dagger's giant hand coming for him. " I'm sorry...." she only said. But Vivi was determined and placed his hands in front of him to send a fire to the giant fingers, hurting her.

"Oouuuuch !! that hurts ! " She said while putting her finger in mouth to calm down the pain. Meanwhile Vivi ran to Garnet's kneecap, and looked down. He feared the heigh between him and the ground, Vivi might be agree to wait for death, but not for coming to it ! Anyway he had no choice as Eiko's hand was reaching for him, so he jumped...

1152.content:
Tidus walked through a calm,grassy meadow.Despite his position,he wasn't calm at all.Clutching his sword tightly,he nervously looked about,knowing that a monster could pop up out of the grass at any time.Through a series of twists and turns of exploring,he had become seperated from the rest of his friends.A twig snapped behind him,and he whirled around,sword arm cocked back and ready to chop any Sin offspring to bits.

Nothing.There was nothing behind him.He lowered his weapon,but was still tensed and just pumped with adrenaline.He continued to walk and search for his lost companions.

After hours of wandering the grass fields,Tidus had to take a break.He plopped down on the ground,sweating."I've searched all over...and no sight of any living thing."He said to himself,pulling a small apple from one of his many pockets used to carry items.He munched on the apple fast,he was starving.Tossing the apple peel aside,he suddenly found himself very tired.

He layed on his back,staring up at the ever darkening sky as the sun went down.A few minutes later,Tidus was asleep.

After what seemed only a few seconds later,he was abruptly woken up by violent quakes.Jumping to his feet,he grabbed his blade,yet again ready for a fight.He was faced with something that was completely unexpected.

A barefoot was before him.Not just any normal human foot.It was......big,to say the least.The toes wiggled slightly,as if teasing him.Tidus didn't even notice the fact that the tall field grass that had come up to his knee's,had now expanded to the the sky.Transfixed by the gigantic foot,Tidus approached it,curious.
1152.title: FFX

11522.content:
Tidus walked up to the foot,and began to make some size comparisons in his head.Was he small?Or had a giant appeared?He still hadn't noticed that he had shrunken just yet.The foot really was huge.Each toe seemed to be hundreds of feet tall,and the foot itself miles long.Looking to his left,Tidus could see another giant foot in the distance.He touched the big toe,which he was closet too.The skin was extremely soft,as whoever's foot this belonged to,the giant took care of it.

Taking in a breath through his nose,Tidus didn't smell anything either.The foot didn't have the smell associated with it,in fact it smelled of sweet lotion.Now,Tidus had to figure out who this gigantic foot was attatched to.He looked up...

A Giant of massive proprtions loomed high in the sky.It seemed to be female,since the pillar-like legs were shapely.Even higher up,a pair of heaving breasts blocked his view of the face.So,he'll have to guess who the Giantess was through clothing.

The Giantess is wearing...
