Inspector Carmelita Montoya Fox had finally done it,capture the uncatchable Thief Sly Cooper.She dragged his unconscious body through the Museum,and tossed him into the back of her Police Cruiser."No need to cuff him.He'll be out for hours."She said to herself,a smug grin appearing on her face.

She patted the pistol that hung on it's holster by her hip,glad that new device did it's charm.She had recieved the device a few weeks ago in a strange package with no return address.She had just considered it a prank,and had left it to gather dust on her office desk until tonight.Usually,her shock pistol would have no effect on the cunning Raccoon,as he had built up an immunity to the pain over the years.

But this device,with one shot,took down Sly.

As she drove off to Police Headquarters,strange things began to happen to sly.Turning around to check if the Thief was still out cold,Carmelita noticed something.Sly's clothes were more baggy than usual.Baggy clothing would have led to Sly being captured so easily,and Carmelita remembered his blue attire being much more tighter on his wiry frame.

Her eyes went wide as she saw the result of the baggy clothes.Sly steadily shrank in his deep dark unconsciousness,in a matter of seconds he had dropped a few inches in height.His blue cap was now two sizes too big for his head.

"What did that shot do to you,Cooper?"Carmelita wondered.
155211.title: Continue...

choices: A Vast,seemingly never-ending field around him.(Micro)
1552112.content:
Carmelita was silent for the rest of the drive.She occasionally glanced back,and watched Sly's progress of shrinkage.The Master Thief,in a matter of 30 minutes,had shrunken from the size of a full grown man to that of a small child,right now his clothes were as if he was playing dress-up in his Father's clothing.

She arrived at her apartment,and got out of her Police Cruiser."What a night...."She sighed,and went around to the back of the car,pulling the small Sly out of the car.She could actually cradle him in her arms,as he was bordering the 1 foot in height mark.She tossed his clothes over her shoulder,and began walking up the stairs to her apartment.She gave a little smile to the thought of whoever was looking out their window right now.Did Miss Fox adopt?

........
........
........

"Uhn."Was all Sly muttered.He stood up,stretching his limbs."That was a good sleep."He said to himself,his eyes adjusting to the dim darkness around him immediatly,due to years of stake-outs and waiting in the dark.

"......Whoah....."He said,looking around.He saw...
1552112.title: Effects of a Weapon

choices: A foot rub would be nice
15521121.content:
Sly blinked several times as he stared at a giant brown boot in front of him. This was not something he usually woke up to see. Wondering if he had bonked his head, a dry cough from above him got his attention. Looking up, he stared along a tight pair of blue pants until reaching a furry bare midriff and then paused at the sight of two massive breasts tightly packed into a blue top. He probably would have stared at those lovely goodies all night if the towering beauty didn’t bend over and Sly found himself now looking at the gorgeous if not slightly abrasive face of one inspector Carmelita Fox.

“I suppose telling you you’re under arrest would be pointless right now,” Carmelita said down at the tiny thief at her foot. She had gotten to her apartment and put Sly on the ground for only a minute so she could put away her coat. She had been shocked to come back and find the raccoon had lost nearly eleven inches. He was only one inch tall now, which put him off his game at first, but Sly didn’t get his name just form being sneaky.

“A pleasure Inspector Fox. Are you wearing heels this evening, you look taller?” There was always this game they played, Carmelita tried to arrest him, he flirted and then escaped. The first two parts seemed to be happening, but he had no clue how he was going to do the third. He then looked down at himself and tuned back to Carmelita with a wolfish grin on his raccoon muzzle. “And I’m naked too. Am I in for an enjoyable evening?”

“Can it Cooper, I’m in big trouble and it’s all your fault.” Sly was curious what he could possibly to be blamed for other then the obvious, but he wasn’t allowed to ask because Carmelita was reaching down to grab him. Sly stumbled back at her tree trunk like fingers came down towards him. He was helpless as she pinched her fingers around his waist and lifted him up. Sly relaxed, letting himself be carried up. He didn’t like being shrunken, it was very frustrating being so helpless. He was brought right in front of Carmelita’s beautiful face and he had to smile despite the situation. At least he was shrunken with a gorgeous fox.

“Do you know what I had to do to catch you Sly?” Carmelita sighed as she sat back on her couch. Sly was jostled around in her grasp, spinning his arms around as he was dropped into the sitting inspector’s palm. Sitting on her furry palm, he sat down to listen to the Inspector bemoan her bad fate. “I used an unregistered firearm against a suspect, which is against Interpol’s weapon’s policy. I thought if I handed you over unconscious no one would ask how I caught you, but there is no way I can hide the fact your one inch tall. I’ll lose my badge for sure if anyone finds out about it and it’s all your fault.”

“There, there, it’s alright,” Sly calmly said, patting the side of Carmelita’s hand comfortingly. He knew that he should be getting upset about the situation he was in or the fact that he was being blamed for everything, but a Cooper is always a gentleman and never likes to see a lady hurt. Honestly, he was too busy looking for the escape routes and exits in the apartment to bother to get upset. Being small was certainly not fun, but it opened up a lot of places to hide and run too.

“No, it’s not alright. I wanted you arrested Cooper, locked behind bars, never allowed to see the light of day. I never planned to turn you into this,” Carmelita sputtered and pointed at the miniature thief in her hand. Sly nodded sympathetically. The only reason that he was at odds with Carmelita was because they believed in very different things. Carmelita believed fully in law and justice. While he was more inclined to believe in stealing anything that he can get his hands on and having fun doing it. If she wasn’t a member of Interpol and he wasn’t a thief, they could be great friend or maybe more.

“You know what would make you feel better, a nice foot rub. I’m sure your feet have to be killing you from running around all day after me. I’ll give you a nice foot rub, we can talk and later you can call me team to come fix me so I’ll be back to normal size to go to jail.” Sly knew the last part was stretching it a bit, but he had to try. He only knew one person that could help him and he worked for the thieving raccoon. If he was going to get fixed, Carmelita had to make the call, it was his only hope.
15521121.title: One Inch Raccoon

choices: "You're gonna have to do a lot more chores than that for a phonecall!"
155211212.content:
Silence hung in the air, time seemed to slow to a crawl as Sly awaited Carmelita's response. This was perhaps his best if not only means through which he could return to normal, although truth be told if he had to be shrunken Carmelita was the best person to be with.

"We'll see, it depends on how good this foot rub is gonna be Cooper." Carmelia smirked, eyes locked on the coffe table across her couch. A couple of loud thumps caused Sly to turn back and look at the table himself, there laid Carmelia's boot clad feet resting firmly on the wooden surface. Leaning forward a small bit the giant fox carefully placed Sly at the farthest point she could reach without rising from her busom, her lower leg.

"I trust you can make the rest of the way to my feet without making a break for it Cooper."

The shrunken thief turned his head back and smirked, " I dunno, I'm pretty tempted to see how our little game of Cat and Mouse plays out now."

"With you under the boot." Carmelita laughed. " Unless you wanna see what that's like I suggest you hurry."

Jokingly Sly did a salute, "Yes Inspector Fox!" Then he turned around and started running towards Carmelita's boots; all the while mentally plotting his ineveitable escape from the fox. It was sort of like Dejavu, not too long ago Carmelita was a giantess due to...unusual circumstances and Sly traveled along the same pants he now ran along. Thanks to his thief agility Sly soon arrived at Carmelita's bare ankle where he leapt off and calmly walked his way to the sole of her boot.

"As nice as your boots are I can't sit here looking at em all day Carmelita!"

Carmelita closed her eyes uncaringly and shrugged, "Then I guess you better start working on taking em off then."

"Sure....." Sly looked at the boots that rose over a dozen times his height. "How?"

The giant fox replied with a slightly annoyed tone, " Figure it out, you are a thief after all. Tell you what, do it in ten minutes and I'll take one off for ya."

"I'm used to stealing jewels not foot wear." The raccon complained under his breath. He thought for a moment, how could he remove Carmelita's boot in ten measly minutes? The answer Sly came up with was simple, undo the knots and do your best from there. It was a little bothersome having to reclimb Carmelita's shoe from the sole to the tip but Sly did it, all the while worried that Carmelita would suddenly crush her little lovable nuisance. Upon arriving at the tip of her boot Sly leapt gracefully into the air, falling far and ending up over halfway towards his target which he started running to upon landing. In a mere couple minutes Sly arrived at the base of Carmelita's boot laces which were tied in a very fancy and complicated knot.

Sly rubbed the back of his head with a nervous laugh, "My cane could really help about now."

Before the thief could plan any further Carmelita's booming god-like voice rang out from afar. "Times up Cooper and you didn't even do a thing."

Sly twirled around and faced Carmelita with a devilish smirk, "Can you blame me? A womans feet have to be treated with care you know. Gotta prepare somehow."

Carmelita chuckled as her lips twisted into a smirk, "Such a gentleman, I think a reward is in order." Slowly the giantess began leaning forward again.

As her hands began nearing Sly he smirked, " Please say it's a kiss."

"No. But the boots will be coming off." Despite minor disappointment Sly watched as Carmelita worked her boots off, undoing the knots and slowly sliding them off. Instantly the air seemed to change, seeming to mix with the weak smell of feet. Once the boots were off Carmelita gently flicked Sly from it and tossed them aside. The shrunken thief fell and softly landed between Carmelita's big and second furry toes. "You're welcome, now get to rubbing."

Obediantly Sly complied, rubbing his two palms in circles he began the arduous task of massaging. "My my, I was expecting an odor to die for... literally but this isn't bad at all. Carmelita, you've been taking good care of these babies haven't ya?"

Carmelita shrugged and seemed to avoid her gaze, "So what if I do? A girl can't have nice feet?"

"I never said that, it's just a pleasant surprise." The giantess didn't seem to respond so Sly simply continued with his massaging. Carmelita's foot was like the rest of her covered in fur, orange on the top and sides with a bright yellowish tan for her soles, it was soft to the touch and didn't exactly hinder Sly's massaging. The smell was kinda bad, but only because of Sly's size; to a normal person unless their nostrils were directly between her toes Carmelita's feet would have held no odor. It didn't really bother Sly though, even if it was at her feet he was with Carmelita; granted she was silent as a tree.

"You know......." Sly began as he worked his way to Carmelita's sole, "This is technically a date, a first date at that."

"Shut up." Carmelita replied, eyes shut as if she was either very angry of thoroughly enjoying the massage. The shrunken raccoon shrugged and continued his massaging, soon losing track of time in every sense. He massaged every little area, the ball, the sole, the toes, between the toes, even the top of Carmelita's feet. Occasionally she would let out a pleasurable moan, something that let Sly know he hit a sweet spot which he massaged better than normal. It took a full two hours just to cover one foot and even longer to cover the other, not because Sly was getting tired but because climbing up to the toes was a heck of a lot harder than getting dropped there. Still Sly didn't complain and before he knew it he was done.

Carmelita let out a loud yawn as her eyes opened, "Over all ready?"

Beside Carmelita's foot Sly gave a gentleman bow, "Afraid so milady. Now as much as I'd love to tend to your whims I believe I have a phone call to make."

"To your gang right?"

Sly nodded, "My my smart, beautiful and a good memory! That's right."

Carmelita averted her gaze as if uncertain.
155211212.title: Pleasuring Ms. Fox

choices: Sly Finishes relating his story to Bentley
Carmelita takes the phone before he finishes
1552112121.content:
"Okay, a deal's a deal."Carmelita stood up,her movements each creating small quakes that nearly rocked Sly off his feet.He watched the skyscraper-sized Carmelita walk off,and he smiled at her beautiful,if not gigantic figure.

Carmelita returned with the phone in hand,and placed it upright besides Sly.He looked up at her."How am I supposed to make this work?"He still had that ever-present grin on his face.How was he going to make it work?To the one inch high Raccoon,the phone could have been a 3-story high building,with the buttons each a window.Carmelita sighed,a noise that sounded like a gust of wind.

"Do you want me to call them for you?"She asked,putting her hands on her hips."That would be very kind of you,madam."He added a little flourish with his hand.

Carmelita picked up the phone,and asked Sly for his Gnag's current number.He told her,she dialed,and the phone was ringing.She placed it back down on the ground for Sly."Don't think I'm going to just hold you in front of it.Do this part yourself."

Sly stretched a little,and gave a running leap.He grabbed onto the bottom part of the phone,and grunted as he hauled himself up to the receiver end."This would be so much easier with my cane..."He muttered,looking out of the corner of his eye to see all his clothing and gear in a crumbled pile in the corner.

The ringing ended,and a nasally voice answered."Sly,is this you?"

"Bentley,yes it is."He replied,speaking as loud as he could.

"Sly,what's the matter?It sounds like your whispering."Bentley the turtle,the brains of Sly's operations asked.

"Oh,I'm just fine.If not....feeling a little down right now.Sit down and grab a snack,this story might take a while...."
1552112121.title: Bringing Up the Favor

choices: He's coming to eat too, so she can keep an eye on him.
Carmelita puts him in her boot to make sure he doesn't run away while she eats
1552112122.content:
Eventually Carmelita looked at Sly with what seemed to be a playful grin, "It's gonna take a lot more than a foot rub to let you call your gang. Interpol could have my phone bugged, people already think we have a questionable relationship as is!"

"What's questionable about it? You got two attractive youths locked in the battle of love." Sly replied smoothly, raising his eyebrows like he was hitting on Carmelita...again.

Almost instantly Carmelita showed signs of aggression, rage even, but for a split second she showed a kind of...loving expression, which Sly noticed easily. "Can it Cooper! My point is you're gonna have to do a lot more for me to risk my job!"

"Well we wouldn't want that would we? Then how would prison be any fun?"

"Maybe if it was my boot, you felt kinda nice between my toes." The fox replied with a stern yet playful tone.

Sly shrugged and patted a hand against Carmelita's foot, "As tempting as that is, something tells me I wouldn't exactly call that fun. Maybe if I my prison was a little higher up and more fun?"

Instinctively Carmelita covered her chest and blushed, "Pervert! I really should just step on you and solve this problem."

Sly still showed no signs of remote worry, "Then go ahead Inspector Fox, or maybe we can discuss my next few odd jobs around here?" Normal people would have been angry at Carmelita for breaking her word on the deal, angry that they would basically be used as slave labor, but Sly was far from normal and hey he was having fun.

Carmelita clicked her tongue and pulled her head back, obviously thinking. Before anything happened though she slammed her foot flat on the table and had Sly pinned beneath it, "That's to make sure you don't run on me." Briefly showing a playful smile Carmelita rose her foot up and stepped again, "That was just because it felt nice. Feel free to pleasure my feet some more as I think things over."

Sly did just that, massaging yet again to pass the time, heck he was halfway tempted to plant a kiss on Carmelita's lovely sole, she was a hotty after all. But she might get the wrong idea so Sly would settle for a kiss on the lips later, for now he just massaged and plotted what he could do to help himself in this situation.

Meanwhile Carmelita was lost in thought about what to do, there were a ton of activities that were possible...but many of them bordered on cruelty and abuse...whereas others were too nice. She didn't want to be outright evil with Sly, yet at the same time he didn't deserve a kind caring owner either, he needed discipline and that made the whole process complicated. Some events were rather bad, like making Sly lick her feet, sitting on him and grinding him beneath her, tossing him in her mouth, whereas other activities seemed far too nice, having him rest in her cleavage, kissing him, ...adult things with him...being a cop like her was frustrating. But for the moment it seemed Carmelita's body told her what to do, her stomach growled.

Beneath the fox's foot came a slick statement from Sly, "Sounds like someone's hungry doesn't it Carmelita? Maybe we outta head to a nice romantic restaurant."

Carmelita leaned her head forward and watched her foot grind into the table as if to tell Sly "No." but the thief did raise a point, she couldn't do much on an empty stomach could she? But what to do with Sly while she eats?
1552112122.title: Pleasing Ms.Fox is a tad harder than that

choices: Carmelita decides to play with Sly
15521121221.content:
Stew from yesterday and two day old bread was the dinner of Interpol’s top agent Carmelita. With her job keeping her busy all day and taking her out of the country often, she didn’t have much in her home to eat. She was too tired to go out and pick someone up and even if she did have the energy, her tiny prisoner might cause some problems. All she wanted was a meal to fill her belly, what it was didn’t matter. The only thing she had on her mind was rather her dinner guest.

“Nothing like a beautiful woman’s home cooking,” Sly chirped as he dunked a crumb of bread into the swimming pool sized saucer of stew beside him. Carmelita didn’t respond. She gave Sly a sour look and ate her stew, not sure how exactly they went from him giving her a foot rub to sitting down to dinner together. Denying Sly food seemed cruel and she couldn’t take her eyes off him for a second. The only answer seemed to be to sit down together to eat like prisoner and keeper, but it was turning more into the one thing Carmeltia feared most of all.

“Wonderful dinner date Inspector. It’s always a pleasure to dine with such a gorgeous woman,” Sly politely commented as he took a big bite out of the bread and sat back to stare up at Carmelita. Scowling, Carmelita considered batting the minute thief away and wiping that smug look away. But she could, for the same reason she carried a shock pistol instead of a standard gun. She couldn’t bring herself to intentionally hurt a criminal without good cause. The fact that she might be attracted to Sly had nothing to do with it.
“May I ask you something Sly?” Carmelita said as she put down her spoon and stared at the tiny raccoon. The meal was hardly professional with Sly’s flirtatious attitude, so she might as well use it as an opportunity to get something strait that had been bugging her since her foot rub.

“Ask away,” Sly cheerfully told her, looking hard into her huge green eyes hanging directly above him. They almost looked like gems to the sneaky raccoon. He could look at them all day.

“I want to know why you’re acting this way?” Carmelita asked, getting a blank look from Sly. Sighing, she explained it, trying not to blush from her own words. “What I mean is, you are shrunken and completely at my mercy. I could do anything to you and no one would know. I could keep you for the rest of your life, enslave you under my foot or something just as worse, but all you do is smile and flirt with me. Aren’t you afraid about what I can do to you? I expected you to get angry when I refused to call your crew, but you just smiled. Why are you treating this like it’s some kind of….of…”

“Date?” Sly finished and Carmelita nodded quickly. The lure to do something to Sly in his weakened state had been tempting Carmelita all night. From doing something cruel to punish the thief for all the trouble he had caused her, like making him lick her sweaty feet or be crushed under her butt. To the more sultry desires to press her lips against his small body or let him roam over her naked body. These ideas had been going through her head all night and the more she was around Sly the less resistance she had. He had to see that and yet he was treating his situation like it was no big deal and looked at her with only affection. It confused the hell out of her.

“Well that’s simple Inspector Fox,” Sly said and then his whole demeanour changed. He no longer looked laid back or jovial. He was dead serious now, no more games and no more jokes. “It’s because I trust you.”

“Pardon me?” Carmelita blurted out, not knowing what the raccoon was saying. She chased him half way across the world, fought him at every turn of his career as a criminal and was actually the person responsible for him being shrunken down. You don’t trust a person that wants you locked away, it doesn’t make sense.

Sly ignored her, explaining it in detail for her so she could finally understand. “I trust you to do what’s right by your own moral code and by me. You’re not the type of woman that would torture anyone, you may tease and maybe punish, but you have too much compassion to ever really hurt them. Also, we might have our disagreements, but you can’t deny that you like me and I’d be lying if I said I didn’t feel the same. Maybe you could muster up the indignation to hate me if I was committing a crime, but I’m just a helpless raccoon right now. You won’t hurt me and even if you do give in to temptation and abuse me, I can take it. Best case scenario we have right now, you take care of me and maybe we see if size really matters in the bedroom. Worst case scenario, I spend sometime under your feet or your rump, which isn’t the worst thing that could happen to me.”

“Pervert,” Carmelita muttered under her breath and got a bright smile from Sly. The only part worse then the worst thing she could think of was something Sly might enjoy was that he was right. She didn’t have it in her to do anything completely wrong to him. However, she refused to let Sly play with her anymore. He might think he had her completely figured out, but she would just have to put it to the test how far she could go. She might not have it in her to torture him, but she would wipe that knowing smirk off the raccoons face one way or another.
15521121221.title: Why worry?

155211212211.content:
The idea was rather easy to come up with, and once it came Carmelita couldn't help but smile in Sly's direction. Sly noticed it instantly and calmly asked, "What's with the smile Carmelita? Realizing how great the situation is?"

"Something like that...." She replied, wiggling her fingers into the air as if toying with something. "I just decided...that maybe I do need to give in to temptation once in a while. Enjoy myself for once."

"And here I thought our dances all these years were fun." Sly retorted smoothly. Still, despite his otherwise calm demeanor on the inside Sly was practically leaping around in joy. From the way the giant cop phrased her sentence it sounded as if things would be getting really good for the diminished thief.

Still smiling Carmelita gently lifted Sly away from the food, holding him in her palm once more. "Maybe they were fun, but not quite on the same level as this."

Visuals filled Sly's mind, each more tempting than the last. "Why you naughty woman...I like that. Funny, I always thought I was the bold one here."

Carmelita leaned forward just enough so her lips could tease Sly, "Sounds to me like you were wrong. Still, I don't believe I ever said what sort of temptation I'm giving in to."

Sly had already thought of that and his reply came swiftly, "It's either some.... adult temptations, which I wouldn't mind to be honest, or it's some of what you said before; something kind of corelating to slavery. Either way it couldn't be too bad, heck sounds kind of fun."

The Cop's cool playful expression broke instantly, "You...would like being some sort of a slave? What if I just decided to throw you in my boot and forget you ever existed?"

The visual of that entered Sly's mind too, not exactly pleasant but he kept his demeanor. "I don't think you'd be so cruel, plus I don't think Interpol would exactly approve of that. And even if you did do it I'd get away and we could play some more Cat and Mouse." Either way Sly felt safe in all honesty, if Carmelita decided to....prove her womanhood Sly wouldn't fight her on that at all, if she went with the whole slavery deal...well the thief was always open to new things.

Again Carmelita smiled at him, "Maybe you're right, maybe you're wrong. Are you really willing to take that risk? We both know you're skilled enough to try your hand at running away."

Sly shrugged, "What can I say? It's rude to abandon a lady like that. But if you don't mind me asking, just what kind of temptation are you giving in to? The suspense is killing me, plus I need to know if I have to find some nice clothes for the occasion."

"Trust me, you won't Cooper. And I suppose I can answer your question now. What I really want to do is....
155211212211.title: Adult or Evil Temptation?

choices: Walks out of the room.....What a tease!
1552112122111.content:
Carmelita was an officer of the law. Carmelita was a devote believer in justice. Carmelita was a compassionate person that believed in the goodness in people. But sometimes she forgot that along with all those things she was a woman and she had needs. She couldn’t lie and say she didn’t fantasize about Sly Cooper, the dashing thief she chased, but all she did was fantasize. She knew that she could never be with a criminal; it went against everything she believed in. When she held up the tiny raccoon however, she didn’t see a thief and criminal, but the man she had wanted for years completely at her mercy. Sly showed his desires in the open, but Carmelita held them in, letting them build and build until they burst. The dam had ripped open and she wanted to have Sly so bad, she didn’t even know if she could stop if she wanted to.

“Why Inspector Fox, I think you might be flirting with a known criminal,” Sly playfully jested, but was cut off when Carmelita grabbed him and brought him closer to her face. She stared at him closely through her emerald eyes. He looked so adorable at this size, his tiny chest rising and falling, as he was held naked in her hand. She hadn’t thought about the fact that he had been naked since he shrunk, that he had rubbed her feet and eaten with her without anything on, but now that she thought about it, she was really turned on.
“I’m not flirting, Cooper,” she sultrily whispered and then kissed him.

Kissing a raccoon the size of her pinkie toe should have felt odd for most women, but for Carmelita it just felt right. She pushed the top of her lip into Sly’s forehead and her lower one on his chest and puckered up. Her kiss was light, any harder and she could accidentally pull him into her mouth. His face fit snuggly between her lips, rubbing against the spongy flesh as she pushed him into her ruby lips. He didn’t fight or squirm, not showing if he could breath or not. She felt comfortable and happy kissing Sly, much more so then she could say she felt when she kissed anyone else. At that moment, her mind settled on taking this all the way.

The kiss for Sly was unlike any other he had ever felt. When he had between pushed towards her lips an irrational fear that his beloved Carmelita was going to eat him rushed through his mind. He should have known better, but strange ideas go through your head when your staring down a mouth big enough to fit a car into. Instead of the hot, wet inside of her mouth, he got her soft red lips smothering his face. She sucked on his face, rubbing him against every wrinkle on her lips. He could smell her warm, spicy breath and taste dinner on her lips. It was very unusual for him, but he loved it still. He was finally getting a kiss from Inspector Carmelita Fox and he didn’t even need to steal it.

As he was smothered into her soft lips, Sly tried to kiss her back. He crushed his lips into the spongy flesh of her mouth, feverously sucking on the yielding lips. She didn’t feel his tiny lips, only her mouth pressing against his upper body. Carmelita held the kiss for a few more seconds before breaking it. She pulled Sly away from her lips and smiled seductively at him. “Ready to take it further my tiny lover?”

For the first time ever, Sly had no witty response. After being enveloped in the biggest kiss ever, his mind was spinning out of control. He had expected Carmelita to open up to him after getting used to his tiny size, but he never thought she could be so randy. The cold Inspector Fox was no longer holding him, but rather the hot and seductive Carmelita. Honestly, he couldn’t think of a thing to say.

“Speechless,” Carmelita laughed. She lifted Sly up and put him on the top of her head. He snuggled up in her dark blue hair and held on as she started walking. He nuzzled her soft locks, breathing in the sweet smell of her shampoo. Carmelita walked slowly to her bedroom, swaying her hips as she walked. “It’s alright if you have nothing to say, I have other things you can use that mouth of yours for.”

Sly was trembling with excitement. He didn’t know what had gotten into his former pursuer, but he liked it. Standing next to her bed, Carmelita threw Sly off her head by snapping her head forward. He was flung hundreds of feet in the air off her head and landed perfectly on his two feet in the middle of her bed. Carmelita smiled; her little Sly had such agility and flexibility, which would make tonight even better. She licked her full, pouty lips as she looked at her tiny lover in the middle of her bed. She flirtatiously winked at him and slowly grabbed the sides of her jeans.

1553321111.content:
S.D 10, the year of the journey of the SRF-003 Calnus; a ship whose journey is of the most vital importance, the year where man officially began his search for a suitable home among the stars. Originally one of several ships the Calnus is alone in its mission, guided by its capable, if not unusual crew; half of which weren’t even from Earth. In charge of navigations, Reimi Saionji , Bacchus D-79, and Arumat. Meracle, Lymle, Sarah, and Myuria the rest of the crew who usually lounged around the ship, their talents more useful in the field than the ship itself. And lastly there was the captain, Edge Maverick; one of the youngest out there as well as one of the best. Since his mission began Edge had recruited his crew from all over the galaxy; a colorful bunch to be certain but they were the best, and more importantly; Edge’s friends.

At the moment the crew was more or less, boredly waiting. In the midst of light speed travel that was all they could do; the Calnus practically flew itself. Unfortunately this particular trip would take about a week to do; a week of being trapped in the ship. Lymle took to drawing her various symbols all over the ship, anyone who tried to stop her essentially gave up before long. Meracle and Sarah stayed in the lobby and played with each other to pass the time, while not even ten feet away Myuria enjoyed herself at the ship’s bar. At the front of the ship Bacchus spent most of his time calculating various things; as well as making sure the Calnus didn’t experience any issues midflight. Arumat did as he always did; hide himself in one of the cargo rooms and train. Reimi was the only one who couldn’t seem to stay in place; she switched between playing with Lymle, to training, to simply wandering in boredom. As for Edge; like a true Captain he spent the majority of his time asleep. That is to say; until something quite different happened.

(I realize for snoring this sucks but bear with me.) “Huaah….hooo…huah…hoo.” The rhythm of Edge’s snores had grown to a familiar, almost soothing, sound to any in the upper levels of the Calnus. Being Captain Edge worked harder than anyone and showed no signs of exhaustion; until it came time for warp travel, mid warp you’d be lucky to find the young man awake. Being asleep, Edge did not notice his left hand, the glowing symbol donned on it. A symbol he knew of, but was not currently using. It was reacting to something. A symbol by one of the symbologists, one of the many inventions of Bacchus, whatever it was it didn’t matter. What did were the results. It wouldn’t be for the better half of a day before Edge would awaken and realize anything.

15 Hours Later…
“Ugh…” Grunts escaped Edge as he sat up, still half asleep he stood up and started walking. “Food….food…….” His stomach was essentially talking for him, he was dying for something to munch on! Maybe a shower afterwards too, something to wake him up a little bit. He couldn’t sleep through the entire warp after all, a Captain has to show some example. Granted his crew more than understood he needed the rest. Edge started to scratch his rear, “Man, kitchen seems awfully far, it almost looks like…” Edge’s eyes widened in an instant, “….like I’m still on my bed. The heck? I’ve been walking for five minutes! I should at least be out of my room.” It was a few more huffed steps before Edge stopped again, his slowly awakening “Wait…walk…on my bed…?” It a took a moment before the full force of that to hit, but when it did Edge looked around with a full alertness in his eyes. “The heck!? Why is my bed suddenly a great plain?!” Instinctively Edge reached for his sword; grasping only air.“Damn, forgot. I take it off whenever I enter the Calnus.”

Fully alert now Edge surveyed his surroundings, everything seemed the same…just much larger than he’d ever hoped to see. Heck, Edge felt like an ant! Wait…an ant…Edge thought he woke up somewhere else but…what if…”What if I shrunk!?” It seemed a ludicrous idea but with it in mind it seemed to fit perfectly, everything looked, felt and even smelled the same; just a different size. Either the Calnus went through a growth spurt, or Edge got downsized. The blonde young man racked his brain for how this could have happened, the Grigori? An enemy’s Symbol? Just some freak accident in space? They all seemed likely, and all made Edge realize something.

“If I’m tiny then so must my friends! I have to help them!”

Filled with resolve now Edge didn’t continue with his calm collected approach, he took off running right to the edge of his bed. Thank God he didn’t sleep with the blankets on; otherwise some mountainous creases would have made it much harder. Still took Edge a good ten minutes to reach the cliff though, man he was small! Once at the edge of his bed Edge faced a new issue though, how to get down. He didn’t have time for anything fancy like a plan so he just did what he did best, Edge winged it. Grabbing a hold of the soft fabric Edge used it like a fire escape and slid himself down. It wasn’t a perfect slide of anything but it worked and Edge got the floor safely. On the ground Edge felt even smaller, he landed near a crumb, a crumb which was bigger than him….a crumb he wouldn’t even see at normal size.

“Man am I glad there are no bugs in space, otherwise this could be real dangerous.”

No threats in a clean environment like space though, Edge was in no danger whatsoever. But his friend’s may have been, so he continued his rushed pace towards the door. Again arriving in minutes…a lot of minutes…the better half of an hour. But he made it; and encountered a new problem he didn’t consider. The door wasn’t opening. It was an automatic door, rigged to open through pressure plates and/or scanners, but Edge was too small to trigger either of them. He was locked in.

“DAMN!” Edge angrily punched the metal before him, “If I can’t open this door I can’t get to my friends! I have to get it open I have t-“

Wssh..

The door…opened? Edge couldn’t believe it! This had to be the luckiest break of his….his happiness stopped in a heartbeat. The door didn’t open for him, there was something on the other side…something big. The door came in from the side so all Edge could see was…well nothing, but as it opened further more and more became visible…and soon Edge found himself staring at the biggest toes he had ever lain eyes on. Each one literally a mountain to him, heck he could see the body oils clearly! That was not a good thing! A slight smell wafted too, nothing too bad though. Edge was curious though, who was this!?

He strained his neck to look up, things got pretty blurry past the knee but he recognized the person instantly and he knew one thing…his friend’s were fine. That became dreadfully clear as Edge looked at…

1553322222.title: Tomb Raider: Lara Croft?

choices: She steps on Ne's village by accident
15533222221.content:
My name is Ne and I am a member of the Minanachy Tribe. I was born to Zal and Mani one hundred moons ago. I am a man now and alone, my parents were taken by the rat beasts many sunrises ago. My tribe lives inside the heart of a massive tomb, built by the giant gods many, many moons ago. A small lake flows beside our village supplying us with water, the food we hunt for. There are many beasts roaming our home, it is the job of the hunter to both kill these threats and take them back to the village to eat. I am a hunter and proud of it.

There are only several hundred members of my tribe, with the lack of medicine and constant attack by beasts; my tribe is often thinned out. Most men and women don’t live longer then me, especially hunters. But I am strong and fast, I have even avoided the dreaded fangs of the serpent. I have promised myself that I would live long enough to see the next generation be born and teach them the ways of the tribe. We are a proud people, every creature is bigger then us yet we have survived as we will forever and ever. Everyday we thank the giant gods for placing us deep in their tomb, safe from the even larger and more deadly beasts living outside. If we ever left the safety of the tomb, I’m sure we would be doomed.

Today I am hunting far from the tribe, going high up the walls separating out home from the outside world. The cracks make it easy to climb and I travel hundreds of feet within an hour. High above, the juiciest beasts have crawled into the cracks, waiting to be killed. I will catch a thousand leg beasts, cut off its head and bring it back to the village for a feast. That is sure to catch the eye of the chief’s daughter, Zela. I have loved Zela since I was old enough to carry a spear. She is strong for a female, making me want her more then any other woman. She is from fine breed and will provide me with many sons to become hunters. I have got my future all planned out, marry Zela, raise a family and die when I have seen another hundred moons. It is a good life any man or woman wishes for in the Minanachy Tribe.

I have been climbing for hours and rest in one of the cracks along the great wall. I can see my whole village from here, tiny from my point of view. I wonder if the giant gods saw my village this way, just a collection of tiny huts you can hold in your hand. I watch my home wistfully, dreaming of Zela and making her mine. I am always alert for danger, but I am still caught off guard when the world starts to shake. I am nearly thrown from my spot and sent crashing to the ground hundreds of feet down, but I manage to hold on and move back, going deeper into the crack until my back hits something solid. I watch carefully, afraid of what I can’t understand.

Then I see it. The god door, the mile high door that sealed when the giant gods gave us this him, it was opening. For the first time ever it was being pushed open. I watch with terror. Not even the whole village could move the god door, what kind of beast could be strong enough to do it? Visions of giant beasties rush through my head as I clutch my spear to my chest. I might be nothing against whatever could move the god door, but I’d be damned if I let my village be slaughter. I hold my breath as the beast walks in.

“What have we got here?”

The booming human voice doesn’t shock me as much as the creature speaking it. The words mean nothing to me, not that they were important, what walked in was. It didn’t just look human, but also female. Soft white skin, so different then the dark tone of our own. Her shoes were longer then ours, going past her ankles halfway to her thighs. She wore the strangest loincloth I had ever seen; it clung to her bottom tightly like an extra skin. That was nothing compared to what she covered her chest with. I had never seen cloth that light blue or that tight before. It pushed against her bosom tightly, showing off every curve of the impressive chest. Her face was beautiful, much more then Zela’s face which paled in comparison. Her hair hung behind her head in a braid, swaying around as she looked around. The woman was incredible, but her beauty was not what left me speechless but her height. She was over a mile high.

She was enormous in ways that seemed unfathomable to me. If I had been on the ground I would have never been able to see much higher then her waste. Her massive breasts were bigger then my whole village. Why she could cover half the village with just one of her earthshaking feet. I had heard stories of the giant gods, how their hands could cover the sun and their footsteps shake the Earth, but I never imaged that anything could be this big.

I stared at the giantess, her beauty as unmatched as her height. Truly, she was one of the giant gods, here to bring us to a better life.

“Well Lara, what have you found this time?”

Her words mean nothing to me other then the second word she spoke. I think it’s her name, Lara. Such a simple name, for such a divine being. I want to follow her, worship her, give my life for her. Wordlessly I watch her as she moves, my voice lost in wonderment. What is the divine goddess Lara going to do next.
15533222221.title: Lara Croft and the Minanachy Tribe

choices: She stays and continues to converse with Ne
She decides to bring Ne with her to camp
155332222212.content:
Calmly Lara's eyes scanned the tomb, searching for treasures or artifacts. It was the same as every other ruin, carvings on the walls, dank atmosphere that reeked of age, and the apprehensive feeling like a trap could go off at anytime. It was making a thrilled smile come to her mouth, a smile that only grew as she reached for the gun alongside her hip to be safe. She took a single step forward before her well trained eyes saw something remarkable.

---------------------------------------------------

The goddess looked around with her perfect face, no doubt searching for our constantly migrating village. Her slender fingers, which were also covered with a second skin, grasped a most unusual object. Some sort of metal shaped like a curve with two holes at the end. Staring at it somehow I knew, I was staring at a weapon. But...the goddess...Lara....she was so beautiful...so perfect, it was no doubt a weapon used to defend me and my people!

Excitement filled my body as I eagerly jumped up and down, "Goddess!! Goddess Lara! It is I Ne of the Minanachy Tribe! Son of Zal and Mani! Please acknowledge me oh Divine Goddess!!" I ended up on my knees almost bowing to her before I even realized it. Then Goddess Lara took a step forward, her thick leather shoes that were the size of all the previously felled beasts combined made a sound that I had never before encountered. It was....like a rumbling boom....that was really all I could've said to describe it. And right as her foot covered miles of Earth her eyes locked on to the place behind me, my village. I instantly bowed in appreciation and adoration of the Goddess.

--------------------------------------------------

Lara's thick British accent sounded absolutely astounded, she had to blink several times to make sure she wasn't hallucinating. Before her was one step, only one, yet clearly on the other side of the step was a small....structure, and through instinct Lara guessed what it was, and she guessed correctly. Fascinated she leaned over and eyed it closer, the structure or structures as it turned out was a village, a village that could fit on Lara's thumb. And at this close range she clearly saw another astounding sight; a man, a warrior judging by his attire, a man less than a centimeter tall, bowing to Lara.

"Oh my god...." Was all Lara could say. Every explorer and archaeologist knew about this...this myth. The tale of the Minanachy Tribe. A tribe of people so small that by current metric standards they would be one or two milimeters in height. There were tales of them in various ancient Incan ruins. It was hard to notice but whilst the Incans worshipped in their depictions on the tombs, there were smaller beings worshipping them. People didn't know what to make of it for years, by unearthed tablets found roughly ten years ago managed to explain much. It gave the name of the Minanachy Tribe, as well as their practices regarding things such as survival and religion. They survived by hunting the smallest of the small insects, and constantly migrating to avoid something like a spider. And they worshipped average sized people as gods, and there were often tales of this being twisted into blatant abuse. Of course the idea of a race of milimeter tall people was considered fiction, emphasis on was.

Lara couldn't even think clearly, to think that not only the Minanachy Tribe existed, but still exist to the present day was simple astounding. They survived for over five hundred years in a world of war, pollution and famine. The tomb was the resting place of the Incans, and the fortress that defended the Minanachy. This would mean...new breakthroughs in science, historical facts uncovered, the very world could be altered by this find! And Lara would make the find of her career.... For a brief moment her eyes flashed with greed but it instantly vanished, she was not interested in money nor the fame, she only wanted to do this out of pure historical interest. Of course she would report the finding of the Minanachy Tribe, but she would also make sure they are treated humanely, lest they too become extinct.

The bowing warrior regained Lara's attention, and more out of curiousity than anything she asked in pure English, "Do you speak?" The warrior stopped and appeared confused, obviously not understanding or too surprised to respond. So Lara shifted between all the languages from Spanish to Aztec until she knew that she had found something that might work.

------------------------------------

Goddess Lara...up close she was even closer to perfection than I had imagined. Her voluptous curves were open to my sight, and....I wanted to jump in so badly. But it wasn't just that, I wanted...her...Lara. I wanted to live my life at her mercy, even if it meant my home would be something like her nostril of that odd shoe of hers. I wanted to live my life pleasing her. Even if I had met her less than a minute ago, all my village's religions and beliefs washed away in seconds. My life, my religion, my very being itself centered around the Goddess before me. I knelt my head down, I was not worthy to look upon such beauty for a second further.

Then she spoke again, saying words that made little sense to me. I recognized one bit, she said God, apparently a sort of short prayer...while she clearly is God...nothing else could be so perfect so....unique. After a few moments I felt her gaze upon me, and she asked in one of my villages languages if I spoke. I looked up, amazed that Goddess Lara was even acknowledging the speck unworthy of her presence.

She apparently thought I was unable to understand and began using different languages, many of which I knew. Various Gods have visited the village, and quite a few brought with them a new language. As a result me and the villagers all practice nine different languages. Her voice...was so elegant...so serene....I couldn't resist the urge to respond.

"My goddess! I am indeed capable of speech!" Goddess Lara appeared stunned.

-------------------------

Unreal...it was simply unreal that not only the Minanachy Tribe lived, but spoke in Spanish!? The tales behind such a marvel must have truly been great. He referred to Lara as a goddess, to which she couldn't help but chuckle a little bit. But she didn't correct him on it, at least not yet, "Good day to you. My name is Lara, and you are?" She queried in flawlessly executed Spanish.

"I am Ne my goddess!"

This was truly a most amazing discovery, Lara didn't know whether to converse with the man before her or bring him and possibly his village and consult her various textbooks back at her camp regarding this. The things they would know...the possibilities were endless.
155332222212.title: The Minanachy Tribe Live On

choices: The Elders want to sacrifice to her
1553322222121.content:
Lara reached down and reached out her forefinger.She motioned for to jump on.Obedient,the small man jumped on,nearly dissapearing into the fibers of her glove.She brought Ne to her face,squinting so she could just see the speck."So Ne...are you of the Minanachy Tribe?"She whispered,being considerate of his size,as one puff of breath could easily blow out his eardrums or send him flying through the air.
------
I was ever amazed at this magnificant being.She actually decided to put me into consideration,lowering her voice.What a kind Goddess."Yes,I am of the Minanachy Tribe,my Goddess!"I replied,bowing my head once more."If I would be so bold,may I ask for the rest of my tribesmen to meet you?I am not worthy enough to be in your presense alone."
------
The rest of the tribe.An entire village of people that could fit on her thumb.This discovery could very well reveal the entire Incan structure of life!"Yes Ne,I would very much like that.Be quick now!"Lara replied,placing Ne back down on the ground.The speck man jumped off,and ran as fast as he could to his village,shouting at the top of his lungs.Lara waited patiently for the tribe to return.
------
I sped into the village,shouting that one of the Gods had actually decided to speak with us.The Warriors were ecsatic,the women cheering and the children squealing with laughter.The entire tribe had gathered around me,the only people,and the most important, we were waiting on were the council of Elders,the religious leaders.

They came minutes later,all appearing somber and not as happy as the rest of us.The Lead Elder approached me,stroking his beard."Ne,what blasphemy have you brought upon us?A God would never speak to us in person,especially one as lowly as you."He said,dampening the spirits of my people."But it's true,Head Elder!Goddess Lara was kind enough to notice me!And she wants to meet all of you!"I tried not to raise my voice at the Elder,as this could lead to dire consequences."The Gods are much too powerful to bother with us.They leave us new cultures and technologies from time to time,but we must continue to worship them here alone at the altar,not to insult them by lying."

155332222222121211.content:
The year 21XX: an era where machines known as Reploids walked amidst the comman man. They looked like people. Talked like people. Acted like people. Apart from sheer ability and robotic designs, the difference between Reploid and Human was growing more and more minimal. Their very existence was remarkable. They were a revolution in technology; however, much like their human counterparts not all Reploids were good. There were the evil Reploids- the Mavericks, who wreaked havoc wherever possible. Thus came the ones who would stop them. If Reploids decided to go violent, it had to be Reploids who would stop them. Thus the Maverick Hunters were born. In such an organization there was a Reploid unlike any other. His name was Megaman X, a Reploid who's level of emotion was almost...human. He was a pacifist, he detested fighting. Yet not only was he one of, if not the best fighters of the Maverick Hunters. But he often times found himself forced to fight, for better or worse. All the while wondering why must there be violence?

The question haunts him always....

--------------

BOOM

Overhead the loud roar of an explosion jolted X's gaze to the sky where a large hole now laid within a building. Abel City had finally rebuilt itself after yet another Maverick attack, only for the latest Maverick to undo the hard work. "Why do we have to fight?" X asked himself with a sigh. Leaping from the newly constructed hole came a lightning fast Reploid designed off of a wolf. Fast as can be the Maverick landed on the ground before X, easily making a landing from a hundred feet high. Covered in an azure fur with a silver chestplate he stood on his hind legs bringing his height well over X's, arms outstretched with claws poised to attack and eyes full of a familiar madness.

As fearsome as the wolf Maverick looked, X could only look at the machine with pity. "The Sigma Virus did this to you didn't it?." The Wolf only howled in response, but the look in his eyes was definitely the work of the Sigma Virus. X raised his X-Buster with a forlorn expression, "I really am sorry..." Energy began to build up in his arm and with a small grunt X fired a charged blast at the Maverick before him. With his speed the Wolf easily dodged, but X was right behind him not missing a beat. In response the Wolf kicked his legs and began to run, with X right behind him. More shots were fired, the Maverick was on the defensive. It had only been a couple minutes but already shots from the X-Buster were beginning to graze the Maverick, one nicked his leg, forcing him to slow down. X wasted no time in taking the chance to get in front of the Maverick and charge for the final shot. But the Maverick still had one trick left. The gaping maw of the Reploid opened to reveal a hidden gun aimed directly at X. X's eyes widened at the sight of the weapon but he couldn't let it stop him. He continued the final seconds of his charging before lighting off a shot from the X-Buster. Simultaneously the Wolf's gun fired off a laser that struck X directly on the gem in his head. It contained enough of a blast to daze X, but he was able to keep his eyes focused enough to see his shot strike the Maverick's weak spot, finishing him. Landing on the ground X felt his systems struggle to keep him awake. For a single blast to do this perplexed him.

What kind of attack was that? An EMP...? No...What was it...? X's eyes began to close as a pair of feet began to walk towards him. Behind them was many more running in, shouting things like "Secure the Area" and similar phrases. The other Maverick Hunters caught up. X let his eyes shut, knowing he was in good hands.

Why must we fight...?

-------

X wasn't aware of how much time had passed, but soon he found himself awakening. Right away he knew something was off, the area looked unfamiliar. Immediately the Reploid leapt up and quickly looked around. He raised his X-Buster as a safety measure. Or- He would have, but upon trying X saw only an empty air where his X-Buster usually was. The part had been removed!

"Oh, are you up already?" A loud voice echoed throughout the heavens. X looked over and saw someone entering this foreign area....Alia?! It was his fellow Maverick Hunter and friend Alia. And not only that, the female Reploid was a giant! She was easily the biggest thing X had ever seen in his life.

"Alia?! How are you so big?"

Wearing a soft smile Alia gestured to the area around her, "Take a look around before you say that I got big."

X began to look again and noticed what his comrade was referring to. The terrain X took as a foreign land was in fact a Maverick Hunter's living quarters, apparently Alia's living quarters. It simply looked transformed by the sheer scale of it all. X stood atop a desk that rose hundreds of feet in the air and went on for who knew how long. In the distance was a resting pod, also gigantic. At the edge of the room was a window that showcased a city in the distance, but it was all too fuzzy given the sheer distance from X's perspective. And beside him was Alia's computer, once again enormous. He didn't have to be a machine to figure it out.

"I...shrank?" X uttered in disbelief.

Alia nodded, "Yeah. After we recovered you from that battle with the Maverick you began to exhibit strange phenomena. By the time you got to base you were like this. We did what could to repair you but your X-Buster needed some extra work. And we needed someone to look after you because of your size so...Here you are. I volunteered."

"Ah..." X nodded, all of it a bit much to take in. "What are we going to do about this?"

"We have a huge number of specialists working on that, and if it's okay with you. I'd like to do a bit of testing myself."

"Test away."

Alia nodded, "I hope you don't mind, but I would prefer it if I were a bit more...comfortable..." X raised an eyebrow at his friend's words when he saw her take a seat at the desk and begin to reach for her leg attachments. Or rather, boots as it would happen to be. Alia was removing her footwear to reveal a pair of well-designed, bare feet. Each toe seemed to wiggle as realistically as a human's.

X let out a surprised sound, "Wow Alia. Not many Reploids have removable footwear, let alone feet. That's impressive!"

Alia smiled at the shrunken Reploid, "Yeah I guess so. I never really thought about it." Alia stared at her toes, painted pink like her armor. Or rather, designed to appear painted pink. "I was designed very thoroughly." There was almost a seductive tone in Alia's voice as she began to move her hands for her chest piece. X Could only stare in disbelief as that too began to slide off, revealing a feminine body type underneath, still covered with the black underneath though. Alia was designed so much like a regular girl X...honestly X wondered if he was aroused by the sight of her. She was so bare compared to normal, it was practically the human equivalent of being naked in front of him.

Alia caught X staring and giggled nervously, "Yeah, I was designed with a completely human appearance so all this other stuff is actually just robotic accessories. Kind of like clothes."

"That's really amazing Alia!"

The gigantic Reploid leaned over so her eyes were mischievously eyeing X, "Oh you haven't seen nothing yet." Up close X stared into the massive pupils. He wondered exactly what Alia meant by that...

info.description:
I'm sure this doesn't need much explanation, it's a Video Game Shrink interactive. If you don't know what this is it's simple, choose a game and make someone shrink and let the wacky ( and more often than not perverted) adventures begin.

Before we begin please note the rules though.

-Unless it's a choice chapter please try to refrain from one or two sentence adds.

- No toilet, unbirth, extreme anal, scat, or anything too weird.

-Only female giants please.

- Only shrinking! No growth (Cry all ya want lol)

- If possible please keep a person in character. OOC is allowed though.

-No crossovers, so Sonic can't appear in Mario. However, crossover games like Super Smash Bros are allowed.

- The main character(s) can die but please don't try to kill them right away.

- There can be multiple characters shrunken or multiple giants

-You can curse but if there is a whole lot of cursing in your add please at least censor some of it. ( Ex: S***)


I can't think of anymore rules so enjoy and please add ^^ and if there are any questions feel free to ask.
